1002.quote: In the household in which I was raised, the themes were pretty simple. 'Work hard. Don't quit. Be appreciative, be thankful, be grateful, be respectful. Also, never whine, never complain. And always, for crying out loud, keep a sense of humor.'
1002.author: Michael Keaton

1003.quote: I know that when I pray, something wonderful happens. Not just to the person or persons for whom I'm praying, but also something wonderful happens to me. I'm grateful that I'm heard.
1003.author: Maya Angelou

1004.quote: I am thankful for laughter, except when milk comes out of my nose.
1004.author: Woody Allen

1005.quote: I am what I am, I'm doing very well in my life, and I'm thankful to God for that.
1005.author: LL Cool J

1006.quote: Every day I've got to be thankful that I am alive, and you never know - the cliche is, I guess, you could get hit by a bus tomorrow, so you'd better be at peace with whatever you got going at the moment.
1006.author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

1007.quote: Thankfully, dreams can change. If we'd all stuck with our first dream, the world would be overrun with cowboys and princesses.
1007.author: Stephen Colbert

1008.quote: I'm thankful for the ability to share my faith in a lot of different places. It's something that I take as a responsibility and an obligation to handle as best as I can.
1008.author: Tim Tebow

1009.quote: Be thankful we're not getting all the government we're paying for.
1009.author: Will Rogers

1010.quote: I am a big defender of 'Harry Potter,' and I think any book that gets kids to read are books that we should cherish, we should be thankful for them.
1010.author: Judy Blume

1011.quote: I'm so thankful for that struggling period. That time is really great where you have no idea what's going to happen.
1011.author: Abbi Jacobson

1012.quote: It is just that we should be grateful, not only to those with whose views we may agree, but also to those who have expressed more superficial views; for these also contributed something, by developing before us the powers of thought.
1012.author: Aristotle

1014.quote: Immensely grateful, touched, proud, astonished, abashed.
1014.author: Boris Pasternak

1015.quote: Feeling gratitude isn't born in us - it's something we are taught, and in turn, we teach our children.
1015.author: Joyce Brothers

1016.quote: Thank you, dear God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough. Thank you for the rain. And for the chance to wake up in three hours and go fishing: I thank you for that now, because I won't feel so thankful then.
1016.author: Garrison Keillor

1017.quote: A single grateful thought toward heaven is the most perfect prayer.
1017.author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

1018.quote: The unthankful heart... discovers no mercies; but let the thankful heart sweep through the day and, as the magnet finds the iron, so it will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings!
1018.author: Henry Ward Beecher

1019.quote: A proud man is seldom a grateful man, for he never thinks he gets as much as he deserves.
1019.author: Henry Ward Beecher

1020.quote: Thanks to television, for the first time the young are seeing history made before it is censored by their elders.
1020.author: Margaret Mead

1021.quote: I'm one of the most fortunate people in the world.
1021.author: Rose Kennedy

1022.quote: It's been quite a roller coaster ride, but I've grown and learned a lot about myself. The greatest thing is being able to interact with fans and touch people's lives... for that I give thanks.
1022.author: Christina Aguilera

1023.quote: God has two dwellings; one in heaven, and the other in a meek and thankful heart.
1023.author: Izaak Walton

1024.quote: The trick is to be grateful when your mood is high and graceful when it is low.
1024.author: Richard Carlson

1025.quote: I wouldn't change anything. I've made mistakes, but thanks to those mistakes, I've learned.
1025.author: Enrique Iglesias

1026.quote: I'm really looking forward to the Hall of Fame ceremonies. It's going to be unbelievable - just crazy. I'm looking forward to thanking all the fans for inspiring me to go out there and play my best football each and every game.
1026.author: Jerry Rice

1027.quote: Of all the characteristics needed for both a happy and morally decent life, none surpasses gratitude. Grateful people are happier, and grateful people are more morally decent.
1027.author: Dennis Prager

1028.quote: I feel grateful because I have a lot of love in my life. I found the person I'm sharing my life with. I have a good man.
1028.author: Gisele Bundchen

1029.quote: I'm grateful for my brokenness. I'm grateful for my humility.
1029.author: James McGreevey

1030.quote: Whatever life throws at me I'll take it and be grateful for it as well.
1030.author: Tom Felton

1031.quote: As we look forward to freedom, the shining city on the hill and the best days of America lying ahead, it is the men and women in uniform who protect, defend and make us proud to whom we should look and give thanks every night.
1031.author: Robin Hayes

1032.quote: I'd like to say to all my fans out there, thanks for the support. And to all my doubters, thank you very much because you guys have also pushed me.
1032.author: Usain Bolt

1033.quote: There's no happier person than a truly thankful, content person.
1033.author: Joyce Meyer

1034.quote: The simple act of saying 'thank you' is a demonstration of gratitude in response to an experience that was meaningful to a customer or citizen.
1034.author: Simon Mainwaring

1035.quote: I am what I am thanks to my mother, my father, my brother, my sister... because they have given me everything. The education I have is thanks to them.
1035.author: Ronaldinho

1036.quote: I have nothing to ask for, thanks to God. Everything I have, God has given me.
1036.author: Mariano Rivera

1037.quote: If you reflect often on how His Atonement has changed you, and if you give thanks often, you will find that your witness of Him gains power to touch the hearts of others. When those you invite out of your own testimony feel that witness, they will come to accept Him as their Lord and Savior.
1037.author: Henry B. Eyring

1038.quote: Take heed, then, often to come together to give thanks to God, and show forth His praise. For when you assemble frequently in the same place, the powers of Satan are destroyed, and the destruction at which he aims is prevented by the unity of your faith.
1038.author: Ignatius of Antioch

1039.quote: We can always find something to be thankful for, and there may be reasons why we ought to be thankful for even those dispensations which appear dark and frowning.
1039.author: Albert Barnes

1040.quote: I'm really thankful to God, man. Like now, I'm really making a real comeback with my group. With or without a record, with or without a movie. And behind all the negative press behind this movie.
1040.author: Ike Turner

1041.quote: I am thankful I can see much to admire in all religions.
1041.author: Alfred Russel Wallace

1042.quote: We have to be thankful to the Czechs that they did their duty. The Czech Republic won, I can't believe it. It was a huge party with all the people here.
1042.author: Ruud van Nistelrooy

1043.quote: The children have been a wonderful gift to me, and I'm thankful to have once again seen our world through their eyes. They restore my faith in the family's future.
1043.author: Jackie Kennedy

1044.quote: I'm very humbled and honored. I'm very thankful to the Asian-American Community for all their support!
1044.author: Jeremy Lin

1045.quote: I am very proud of my mom and consider her the most courageous woman I know. With perseverance, sacrifice and hard work, she raised a family of Olympic athletes and gave us the tools and the spirit to succeed. That is something that my brothers and I will always be thankful for.
1045.author: Diana Lopez

1046.quote: I'm thankful for the three ounce Ziploc bag, so that I have somewhere to put my savings.
1046.author: Paula Poundstone

1047.quote: I'm just very thankful. And I say that a lot because that's the most important message.
1047.author: Pharrell Williams

1048.quote: I think my mother is my biggest influence. There are so many things I hate about her but at the same time I'm thankful for her. All I know is that when I'm a parent I want to be just like my mom. I can talk to my mom more than any of my friends could talk to their parents.
1048.author: Nikki Reed

1049.quote: China has not established the rule of law and if there is a power above the law there is no social justice. Everybody can be subjected to harm. I'm just a citizen: my life is equal in value to any other. But I'm thankful that when I lost my freedom so many people shared feelings and put such touching effort into helping me.
1049.author: Ai Weiwei

1050.quote: I've had this unbelievable amount of good fortune and I'm just so thankful for it. But at the same time I feel exceptionally guilty. I have so many friends who are talented graduates of Juilliard and are exceptional actors and I'm the lucky one that somehow got such a fortunate break.
1050.author: Matthew Gray Gubler

1051.quote: I am definitely a Type A personality, always rushing around, trying to do too much, not good at just lying on the beach. But I'm so thankful for everything I have: wonderfully supportive parents and sisters, the best husband in the world, terrific students I love teaching and hanging out with, and above all, my two amazing daughters.
1051.author: Amy Chua

1052.quote: I did not break up the Beatles. You can't have it both ways. If you're going to blame me for breaking the Beatles up, you should be thankful that I made them into myth rather than a crumbling group.
1052.author: Yoko Ono

1053.quote: I'm so thankful for my family and friends - they're really supportive. Everyone I work with on 'Austin & Ally;' the cast and crew are like my family now. We have so much fun, and I'm so happy they're in my life!
1053.author: Laura Marano

1054.quote: I think the best advice came from Drew Barrymore, about always finding love in everything you do and keeping a positive attitude and being thankful.
1054.author: Bella Thorne

1055.quote: I had a somewhat religious upbringing. Not strict, but it was there, and I'm kind of thankful for that. If you grow up just watching MTV, that's its own form of religion, and it's not even based on happiness or communal responsibility. I mean, try to construct a worldview out of that.
1055.author: Win Butler

1056.quote: Often people ask how I manage to be happy despite having no arms and no legs. The quick answer is that I have a choice. I can be angry about not having limbs, or I can be thankful that I have a purpose. I chose gratitude.
1056.author: Nick Vujicic

1057.quote: Being away from home was tough, but the challenge and the thrill of being on Broadway was so fulfilling, and I'm thankful to my husband for making it possible and holding it down at home.
1057.author: Nicole Ari Parker

1058.quote: I'm thankful God has given us the technology where we can see each other through Skype on the computer. It's not the same thing, but at least we can see each other. Imagine the time before when that wasn't available and people had to go defend our country. It's really hard. I go two weeks without seeing my family and I go crazy.
1058.author: Albert Pujols

1059.quote: At Thanksgiving, I always start at the top of my list and say I'm grateful for friends, family, and good health. Then I get more superficial... like being thankful for my Louboutins.
1059.author: Christie Brinkley

1060.quote: I'm from Canada, so Thanksgiving to me is just Thursday with more food. And I'm thankful for that.
1060.author: Howie Mandel

1061.quote: Before I get out of bed, I am saying thank you. I know how important it is to be thankful.
1061.author: Al Jarreau

1062.quote: Let me encourage you to get up every day and focus on what you do have in life. Be thankful for the blessings of the little things, even when you don't get what you expect.
1062.author: Victoria Osteen

1063.quote: No one who achieves success does so without acknowledging the help of others. The wise and confident acknowledge this help with gratitude.
1063.author: Alfred North Whitehead

1064.quote: Charity never humiliated him who profited from it, nor ever bound him by the chains of gratitude, since it was not to him but to God that the gift was made.
1064.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

1065.quote: If you suffer, thank God! It is a sure sign that you are alive.
1065.author: Elbert Hubbard

1066.quote: The hardest arithmetic to master is that which enables us to count our blessings.
1066.author: Eric Hoffer

1067.quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought, and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
1067.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

1068.quote: Gratitude is the most exquisite form of courtesy.
1068.author: Jacques Maritain

1069.quote: Thank God we're living in a country where the sky's the limit, the stores are open late and you can shop in bed thanks to television.
1069.author: Joan Rivers

1070.quote: It is another's fault if he be ungrateful, but it is mine if I do not give. To find one thankful man, I will oblige a great many that are not so.
1070.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

1071.quote: I work very hard, and I play very hard. I'm grateful for life. And I live it - I believe life loves the liver of it. I live it.
1071.author: Maya Angelou

1072.quote: I am going to spend my time today just thanking the people that played a role in my career, because I truly do believe that I was blessed by a lot of people that paths crossed mine as I went down the road in my career.
1072.author: Nolan Ryan

1073.quote: Dear Lord, I'm so grateful I'm still loved.
1073.author: Vivien Leigh

1074.quote: Such lovely warmth of thought and delicacy of colour are beyond all praise, and equally beyond all thanks!
1074.author: Marie Corelli

1075.quote: I'm thankful for serendipitous moments in my life, where things could've gone the other way.
1075.author: Rick Springfield

1076.quote: I was successful materially, but I know life is much more than worldly success. I saw all these blessings God had given me. The way to give thanks is obedience to God.
1076.author: Hakeem Olajuwon

1077.quote: I give all the glory to God. It's kind of a win-win situation. The glory goes up to Him and the blessings fall down on me.
1077.author: Gabby Douglas

1078.quote: I turn to someone, I'm not sure, to God I think, but I never ask for anything. I would never pray to win a title; it makes no sense. I've never understood those who pray before a match. I simply give thanks for what I have received.
1078.author: Mario Balotelli

1079.quote: I'm thankful to have Jesus as my Savior. My relationship with God has always been one to where I'm talking to him all day, every day, about anything and everything. It's just a continuous ongoing conversation that I have with the Lord, and I feel like that's brought me closer to Him.
1079.author: Josh Turner

1080.quote: The brave who focus on all things good and all things beautiful and all things true, even in the small, who give thanks for it and discover joy even in the here and now, they are the change agents who bring fullest Light to all the world.
1080.author: Ann Voskamp

1081.quote: We in the United States should be all the more thankful for the freedom and religious tolerance we enjoy. And we should always remember the lessons learned from the Holocaust, in hopes we stay vigilant against such inhumanity now and in the future.
1081.author: Charlie Dent

1082.quote: I'm really thankful and complimented when people come to me and say, thank you for the great times for all these years. But I don't think about it as being a leader.
1082.author: Bill Kreutzmann

1083.quote: I had the pleasure, as Robin said, to live a childhood dream as many young Americans and Puerto Rican children live that play youth baseball. And I feel honored and very thankful for that opportunity.
1083.author: Nolan Ryan

1084.quote: I have spent over 60 years bent over a guitar and to know that I wrote 70 compositions that masters have recorded, that makes me feel so good and full, and proud and thankful to the good Lord.
1084.author: Jerry Reed

1085.quote: I want to let my fans get to know a little about me. I'm very thankful for everything they've done for me so, of course, I'm going to let them into my world a bit. But I really am a very private person, and I love kepping my life to myself - that's how I've always been.
1085.author: Vanessa Hudgens

1086.quote: I'm so happy and thankful I made it a point be a stay-at-home mom.
1086.author: Candace Cameron Bure

1087.quote: As the daughter of a 25-year veteran of the armed forces, I am incredibly thankful for the sacrifices our women and men have made in Iraq, and continue to make in Afghanistan.
1087.author: Barbara Lee

1088.quote: Every musician, their goal in life is to play music that people love, and I've accomplished my goal. I was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and left that chapter of my life and those people in the past. Good and bad, I've loved and am thankful for that chapter.
1088.author: Steven Adler

1089.quote: My relationship with God is what gives me a moral compass on what decisions to make and that stuff. I'm thankful that I have the people around me that I do, and they remind me each day of who I am and what I stand for.
1089.author: Alyson Stoner

1090.quote: It is okay to be an outsider, a recent arrival, new on the scene - and not just okay, but something to be thankful for... Because being an insider can so easily mean collapsing the horizons, can so easily mean accepting the presumptions of your province.
1090.author: Tan Le

1091.quote: I don't know about changing my perspective, because motherhood is such a glorious blessing and I am very thankful for that. It's such a beautiful experience. I so strongly recommend it. It's bliss, love and fulfillment of another level.
1091.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

1092.quote: As with all commandments, gratitude is a description of a successful mode of living. The thankful heart opens our eyes to a multitude of blessings that continually surround us.
1092.author: James E. Faust

1093.quote: I'm a human just like anyone else. We all have our problems that we deal with on and off the field. I'm thankful to have a beautiful wife and child that can help ease those problems when you come home.
1093.author: Torrey Smith

1094.quote: I'm thankful for the incredible advances in medicine that have taken place during my lifetime. I almost certainly wouldn't still be here if it weren't for them.
1094.author: Billy Graham

1095.quote: Gratitude is a duty which ought to be paid, but which none have a right to expect.
1095.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

1096.quote: I realize how unique my path has been. And I'm thankful for that.
1096.author: Vanessa Paradis

1097.quote: I'm so thankful for the Internet because actors and singers and performers now have a way to connect with their fans on a very personal level which I think is quite special.
1097.author: Ariana Grande

1098.quote: Years ago, it was pretty hard to get people to empathize even a little bit with scaly, cold-blooded critters; now, thanks a lot to good PR from television, it is easier to get the message of reptile conservation and tolerance across. We have a lot to be thankful to reptiles for, not the least of which is their control of rodents.
1098.author: Romulus Whitaker

1099.quote: My mother is such an incredibly strong woman. She raised a family of five boys extremely well. She made us all strong, loving, caring people. We all support each other. I'm really thankful to her.
1099.author: Henry Cavill

1100.quote: Just don't let the hype of what people are saying and how much they love you, y'know, just take the compliment and be thankful that people are complimenting you, but don't let it consume you; don't let your circumstances around you and the way people view you make you act a certain way.
1100.author: Mary J. Blige

1101.quote: I believe that human beings are born first and given passports later. I'm really thankful for my journey. And it's a journey I didn't design.
1101.author: Alfonso Cuaron

1102.quote: The first thing I do when I start my day is, I get down on my hands and knees and give thanks to God. Whenever I go outside of my house, the first thing I do is stop at the church.
1102.author: Mark Wahlberg

1103.quote: I've done it all. I'm thankful and proud of what I've accomplished in my life. I hope to keep doing it.
1103.author: Ralph Stanley

1104.quote: I think everything is going to be devastatingly sad - when the phone rings, I know somebody in my family's been hurt, somebody's going to die. I'm sure a therapist would go, 'That's not a good way to live,' but every time it's not that bad thing, I'm so thankful and appreciative.
1104.author: Sandra Bullock

1105.quote: I'm grateful for the opportunities God gave me to minister to people in high places; people in power have spiritual and personal needs like everyone else, and often they have no one to talk to.
1105.author: Billy Graham

1106.quote: Let a nation's fervent thanks make some amends for the toils and sufferings of those who survive.
1106.author: Edward Everett

1107.quote: I'm very thankful to be doing what I'm doing. I feel very blessed.
1107.author: Justin Timberlake

1108.quote: I say grace. I'm a big believer in grace. I happen to believe in a God that made all the food and so I'm pretty grateful for that and I thank him for that. But I'm also thankful for the people that put the food on the table.
1108.author: Alton Brown

1109.quote: We sing a little song before we eat, a little blessing before we eat, and it's really - we're thanking the Lord and the Earth for the food that we eat, and it really brings you together in a profound kind of way.
1109.author: Phil Lesh

1110.quote: I'm thankful for all the things that this job has given me and my family. But probably the thing that I am most proud of throughout my career is that, not only myself, but my family and the people around me have just been regular people, which we are.
1110.author: Brett Favre

1111.quote: I'm thankful that I have lived long enough to become a legend, and I hope I deserve it.
1111.author: Ralph Stanley

1112.quote: If I could write a story that would do for the Indian one-hundredth part what 'Uncle Tom's Cabin' did for the Negro, I would be thankful the rest of my life.
1112.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

1113.quote: It was a free-for-all with music when I was growing up. My mother was a huge music fanatic so I was listening to everything from country to heavy metal to Indigo Girls to Elton John. I guess when I was really young I didn't like Willie Nelson, and she obviously loved him. Now I do too, I'm so thankful to her for playing his music nonstop.
1113.author: Tig Notaro

1114.quote: What's blessed about my life is that I have been able to connect with the global audience on a regular basis. I am thankful for everybody's love, and I reciprocate that, but I also have to deliver on every occasion.
1114.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

1115.quote: I do believe that God blessed me in life with a wonderful family, a successful career, and a loving marriage, and remain thankful for that blessing.
1115.author: Bonnie Tyler

1116.quote: So many people have touched my heart and made an impact on my world. I'm thankful for every lesson and learning experience.
1116.author: Bindi Irwin

1117.quote: Thanks to the Interstate Highway System, it is now possible to travel across the country from coast to coast without seeing anything.
1117.author: Charles Kuralt

1118.quote: I am thankful, of course, for the prize and thankful to God for each story, each idea, each word, each day.
1118.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

1119.quote: Those who give themselves to prayer should in a special manner have always a devotion to St. Joseph; for I know not how any man can think of the Queen of the angels, during the time that she suffered so much with the Infant Jesus, without giving thanks to St. Joseph for the services he rendered them then.
1119.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

1121.quote: All our discontents about what we want appeared to spring from the want of thankfulness for what we have.
1121.author: Daniel Defoe

1122.quote: From too much love of living, From hope and fear set free, We thank with brief thanksgiving Whatever gods may be That no life lives for ever; That dead men rise up never; That even the weariest river Winds somewhere safe to sea.
1122.author: Algernon Charles Swinburne

1123.quote: Look folks, we know who built this country and we know who is going to rebuild it. It's you. Instead of vilifying you, we should be thanking you. We owe you.
1123.author: Joe Biden

1124.quote: I'm thankful to my family, friends, and fans for all of their support.
1124.author: Serena Williams

1125.quote: I'm thankful to be breathing, on this side of the grass. Whatever comes, comes.
1125.author: Ron Perlman

1126.quote: Every one of our greatest national treasures, our liberty, enterprise, vitality, wealth, military power, global authority, flow from a surprising source: our ability to give thanks.
1126.author: Tony Snow

1127.quote: I'm so thankful for the active obedience of Christ. No hope without it.
1127.author: John Gresham Machen

1128.quote: I'm thankful for weird people out there 'cause they're some of the most creative people.
1128.author: Channing Tatum

1129.quote: If I can do one hundredth part for the Indian that Mrs. Stowe did for the Negro, I will be thankful.
1129.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

1130.quote: We have to be thankful considering our number as a family we enjoy very good health generally but you may be sure me and my partner have quite enough to exercise our minds and occupy our attention.
1130.author: John Hawley

1131.quote: The worst moment for the atheist is when he is really thankful and has nobody to thank.
1131.author: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

1132.quote: I'm just really thankful to have the chance to portray a character you don't see every day.
1132.author: Regina King

1133.quote: I am very thankful and blessed to have a healthy and happy baby boy and baby mama.
1133.author: Eric Church

1134.quote: The 'Night Train' has already been a crazy ride for me. We flew around making TV appearances and stadium announcements all over the country, fueled by little more than coffee and adrenaline... so many fans jumped on board with us, and I couldn't be more thankful.
1134.author: Jason Aldean

1135.quote: As a husband, father and public servant, I'm thankful for the counsel and wisdom of my older brothers - Bill, who was a priest, and Kevin, who is a priest.
1135.author: Denis McDonough

1136.quote: I think pregnancy, like life, is what you make it. I received a good hand. I'm thankful and blessed and so peaceful and can't wait to welcome my son.
1136.author: Mara Brock Akil

1137.quote: I am thankful for all the blessings and talents I have been given, but most of all I am thankful for my loving and supportive family.
1137.author: Olivia Holt

1138.quote: There is a lot to celebrate about that little Babe who was laid in a manger. Christians celebrate Christmas because they are thankful for the promise of salvation, which was delivered in human flesh and named Jesus.
1138.author: Monica Johnson

1139.quote: I'm thankful I don't have parents that I feel I need to get their attention. They've always been there for me.
1139.author: Cierra Ramirez

1140.quote: I'm thankful to have time to write.
1140.author: Paul Watson

1141.quote: I understand that being able to appeal to the public and having an amazing sense of humour is not something that comes easy. It's definitely a gift and for which I'm thankful.
1141.author: Kevin Hart

1142.quote: Unfortunately, I'm not 185 and 6-3 and can run and catch fade routes all game. I do the dirty work. I'm all good. I'm thankful for it. Somebody's got to do it.
1142.author: Darnell Dockett

1143.quote: Fame is a funny thing. I like doing normal things. I like going to fairs. I like going to ball games. I like going to Disney World or a big field on the Fourth of July and having picnics with friends. The problem is you're either worried you're going to be recognized, or you're thankful you're not. It's always there.
1143.author: Chris Evans

1144.quote: I know how I want to operate as an artist. And that is by having an honest, genuine dialogue about this kind of screwed up journey I've had that I'm so thankful for.
1144.author: Mary Lambert

1145.quote: There is such a thing as 'thanks-feeling' - feeling thankful. This ought to be the general, universal spirit of the Christian.
1145.author: Charles Spurgeon

1146.quote: I'm just really, really thankful. I'm thankful to the doctors; I'm thankful to the family that donated the kidney.
1146.author: Natalie Cole

1147.quote: I do not so much rejoice that God hath made me to be a Queen, as to be a Queen over so thankful a people.
1147.author: Elizabeth I

1148.quote: Like Christ said, love thee one another. I learned to do that, and I learned to respect and be appreciative and thankful for what I had.
1148.author: James Brown

1149.quote: We can be thankful to a friend for a few acres, or a little money; and yet for the freedom and command of the whole earth, and for the great benefits of our being, our life, health, and reason, we look upon ourselves as under no obligation.
1149.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

1150.quote: Old age is not a matter for sorrow. It is matter for thanks if we have left our work done behind us.
1150.author: Thomas Carlyle

1151.quote: When you read a piece of writing that you admire, send a note of thanks to the author.
1151.author: Sherman Alexie

1152.quote: Well, there's not a day goes by when I don't get up and say thank you to somebody.
1152.author: Rod Stewart

1153.quote: Certainly my parents were a huge influence. They always expected the most out of all of us. And expected us to do our very best. I'm thankful to them for allowing me to do what I wanted to do.
1153.author: Laurel Clark

1154.quote: Certainly the research shows that grateful people are more innovative thinkers.
1154.author: Deborah Norville

1155.quote: By and large, the gospel of grace is neither proclaimed, understood, nor lived.
1155.author: Brennan Manning

1156.quote: He enjoys much who is thankful for little.
1156.author: Thomas Secker

1157.quote: There's a lot of women in the WNBA. There's a lot of women who could be here. To be voted by the fans says a lot - that people are aware of what's going on. I'm really thankful. I think they just really appreciate my talent so I'm definitely grateful.
1157.author: Lisa Leslie

1158.quote: I've had bad jobs. Now I have a good one. I'm thankful.
1158.author: Maurice Greene

1159.quote: But I'm very thankful that no one is slamming my head against the wall anymore.
1159.author: Harry Anderson

1160.quote: I realized this is what God has dealt me, and I should be thankful considering all that's happened to me in my life, but MS caused the movies to stop - stop dead - and I miss it.
1160.author: Richard Pryor

1161.quote: A federal judge did as he was supposed to do and upheld the Constitution. We should be thankful that we have judiciary that will do that.
1161.author: Michael Newdow

1162.quote: I've been allowed to grow over the past twenty years. I've managed to avoid being trapped in one moment of my career and for that, I'm very thankful.
1162.author: Giovanni Ribisi

1163.quote: If I'm not working, I have home time with my family, and if I spend that stressing what's going to happen next, then it's a waste. I have a lot to be thankful for.
1163.author: Ewen Bremner

1164.quote: Well, my first languages are German and Spanish because I was brought up by a Spanish mother and a German father, so I always spoke both languages at home. I'm very thankful that I was brought up in a bilingual house.
1164.author: Daniel Bruhl

1165.quote: I'm definitely aware that the physical appearance is a very temporary gift. I'm very thankful for the opportunities that I've been able to experience, but I keep it all in check and don't let it consume me.
1165.author: Marisa Miller

1166.quote: I'm just so lucky - my office is a racetrack. That is something I'm very thankful for. It's exciting, and it's challenging, and there are a lot of emotions and nerves that come with it, but right there before the gates open, before that minute and a half or two minutes of the race, it just hits you.
1166.author: Chantal Sutherland

1167.quote: Rip Rig & Panic was a milestone for me, and I've always been really thankful that I did that when I was 16. It saved me for when I suddenly became really successful later on. So even when my head's been spinning like a banshee, my feet still feel held down to the ground.
1167.author: Neneh Cherry

1168.quote: It's just been a lot of hard work and lot of auditions. A lot of ups and downs, but a lot of ups, and I'm really happy for my downs, too. I'm really thankful.
1168.author: Bresha Webb

1169.quote: I love going to Africa and stuff. I love going anywhere, really, but I've been to Africa a bunch of times and it's just a beautiful place that needs help, obviously, but helping people that are really thankful is really easy to do. And the people out there always seem so thankful.
1169.author: Kris Allen

1170.quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
1170.author: Isaac Asimov

1171.quote: We are all here on earth to help others; what on earth the others are here for I don't know.
1171.author: W. H. Auden

1172.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
1172.author: Elbert Hubbard

1173.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
1173.author: Margaret Mead

1174.quote: If you haven't got anything nice to say about anybody, come sit next to me.
1174.author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

1175.quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
1175.author: Abraham Lincoln

1176.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
1176.author: Jim Carrey

1177.quote: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often.
1177.author: Oliver Herford

1178.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
1178.author: Steve Martin

1179.quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
1179.author: Mark Twain

1180.quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.
1180.author: Mark Twain

1181.quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
1181.author: Lana Turner

1182.quote: I can resist everything except temptation.
1182.author: Oscar Wilde

1183.quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
1183.author: Mitch Hedberg

1184.quote: I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you.
1184.author: Robin Williams

1185.quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
1185.author: Benjamin Franklin

1186.quote: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
1186.author: Don Marquis

1187.quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
1187.author: Douglas Adams

1188.quote: One advantage of talking to yourself is that you know at least somebody's listening.
1188.author: Franklin P. Jones

1189.quote: Roses are red, violets are blue, I'm schizophrenic, and so am I.
1189.author: Oscar Levant

1190.quote: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade... And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
1190.author: Ron White

1191.quote: Too much agreement kills a chat.
1191.author: Eldridge Cleaver

1192.quote: When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity.
1192.author: Albert Einstein

1193.quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
1193.author: Will Rogers

1194.quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
1194.author: Anthony Burgess

1195.quote: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
1195.author: Theodore Roosevelt

1196.quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
1196.author: Winston Churchill

1198.quote: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
1198.author: Jules Renard

1199.quote: Drawing on my fine command of the English language, I said nothing.
1199.author: Robert Benchley

1200.quote: A nickel ain't worth a dime anymore.
1200.author: Yogi Berra

1201.quote: It's a funny thing about life; if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
1201.author: W. Somerset Maugham

1202.quote: Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.
1202.author: Stephen Hawking

1204.quote: It's simple, if it jiggles, it's fat.
1204.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

1205.quote: I had everything I'd hoped for, but I wasn't being myself. So I decided to be honest about who I was. It was strange: The people who loved me for being funny suddenly didn't like me for being... me.
1205.author: Ellen DeGeneres

1206.quote: Progress is man's ability to complicate simplicity.
1206.author: Thor Heyerdahl

1207.quote: Trust is hard to come by. That's why my circle is small and tight. I'm kind of funny about making new friends.
1207.author: Eminem

1208.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
1208.author: George Burns

1209.quote: All generalizations are false, including this one.
1209.author: Mark Twain

1210.quote: I never said most of the things I said.
1210.author: Yogi Berra

1211.quote: What I am looking for is a blessing not in disguise.
1211.author: Jerome K. Jerome

1212.quote: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.
1212.author: Groucho Marx

1213.quote: There cannot be a crisis next week. My schedule is already full.
1213.author: Henry A. Kissinger

1214.quote: We owe a lot to Thomas Edison - if it wasn't for him, we'd be watching television by candlelight.
1214.author: Milton Berle

1215.quote: Design is a funny word. Some people think design means how it looks. But of course, if you dig deeper, it's really how it works.
1215.author: Steve Jobs

1216.quote: If I want to knock a story off the front page, I just change my hairstyle.
1216.author: Hillary Clinton

1217.quote: Man cannot live by bread alone; he must have peanut butter.
1217.author: James A. Garfield

1218.quote: It's so different when you change your hair color, you're treated so differently. It's a very funny experience. It's fun - I love changing up my hair.
1218.author: Kate Bosworth

1219.quote: Nobody ever went broke underestimating the taste of the American public.
1219.author: H. L. Mencken

1220.quote: We are all born mad. Some remain so.
1220.author: Samuel Beckett

1221.quote: Most comedy is based on getting a laugh at somebody else's expense. And I find that that's just a form of bullying in a major way. So I want to be an example that you can be funny and be kind, and make people laugh without hurting somebody else's feelings.
1221.author: Ellen DeGeneres

1222.quote: The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
1222.author: Terry Pratchett

1223.quote: From there to here, and here to there, funny things are everywhere.
1223.author: Dr. Seuss

1224.quote: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
1224.author: Albert Einstein

1225.quote: Reality continues to ruin my life.
1225.author: Bill Watterson

1226.quote: An idea isn't responsible for the people who believe in it.
1226.author: Don Marquis

1227.quote: Society is like a stew. If you don't stir it up every once in a while then a layer of scum floats to the top.
1227.author: Edward Abbey

1228.quote: A child of five would understand this. Send someone to fetch a child of five.
1228.author: Groucho Marx

1229.quote: Well, if I called the wrong number, why did you answer the phone?
1229.author: James Thurber

1230.quote: The best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as possible.
1230.author: David Ogilvy

1231.quote: I saw a woman wearing a sweatshirt with Guess on it. I said, Thyroid problem?
1231.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

1232.quote: Prejudice is a great time saver. You can form opinions without having to get the facts.
1232.author: E. B. White

1233.quote: A government that robs Peter to pay Paul can always depend on the support of Paul.
1233.author: George Bernard Shaw

1234.quote: All men are equal before fish.
1234.author: Herbert Hoover

1235.quote: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.
1235.author: Peter Ustinov

1236.quote: One of the funny things about the stock market is that every time one person buys, another sells, and both think they are astute.
1236.author: William Feather

1237.quote: I'm undaunted in my quest to amuse myself by constantly changing my hair.
1237.author: Hillary Clinton

1238.quote: It's amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.
1238.author: Jerry Seinfeld

1239.quote: At home in L.A., Sunday is lazy. It's the wife and me lying in bed with coffee, watching 'The Soup' or something funny on TiVo. The kid will occasionally join us. Eventually, breakfast is at a place down the street called Paty's. And we always have some kind of great dinner - my wife makes a great roast beef.
1239.author: Eric McCormack

1240.quote: I have never been hurt by what I have not said.
1240.author: Calvin Coolidge

1241.quote: If women ran the world we wouldn't have wars, just intense negotiations every 28 days.
1241.author: Robin Williams

1242.quote: Everything I like is either illegal, immoral or fattening.
1242.author: Alexander Woollcott

1243.quote: Thinking is one thing no one has ever been able to tax.
1243.author: Charles Kettering

1244.quote: I want my children to have all the things I couldn't afford. Then I want to move in with them.
1244.author: Phyllis Diller

1246.quote: There have been times when I felt suicidal and I would stop my head from going in that direction of negativity because I thought there'd be something I'd miss that was funny in the future. If there's a chance I'm going to laugh tomorrow then want to live to experience that.
1246.author: Dave Navarro

1247.quote: You know the funny thing, I don't get along with rich people. I get along with the middle class and the poor people better than I get along with the rich people.
1247.author: Donald Trump

1248.quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
1248.author: Reba McEntire

1249.quote: People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading.
1249.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

1250.quote: As a child my family's menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it.
1250.author: Buddy Hackett

1251.quote: I was eating in a Chinese restaurant downtown. There was a dish called Mother and Child Reunion. It's chicken and eggs. And I said, I gotta use that one.
1251.author: Paul Simon

1252.quote: I haven't spoken to my wife in years. I didn't want to interrupt her.
1252.author: Rodney Dangerfield

1253.quote: The next time you have a thought... let it go.
1253.author: Ron White

1254.quote: We are supposed to enjoy the good stuff now, while we can, with the people we love. Life has a funny way of teaching us that lesson over and over again.
1254.author: Sheena Easton

1255.quote: You know, fame is a funny thing, man, especially, you know, actors, musicians, rappers, rock singers, it's kind of a lifestyle and it's easy to get caught up in it - you go to bars, you go to clubs, everyone's doing a certain thing... It's tough.
1255.author: Eminem

1256.quote: I love Charlie, Billy Burke's character. Writing for him is so spectacular, he's so funny and wry and every scene he's in he just takes. There's a scene in 'Eclipse' where Bella tells him she's a virgin, and it's the funniest, most awkward scene I've ever seen on film.
1256.author: Melissa Rosenberg

1257.quote: When I was in high school I used to sit by myself in the cafeteria - not necessarily by choice - but I thought it was funny to talk to people that weren't there.
1257.author: Zach Galifianakis

1258.quote: If this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee.
1258.author: Abraham Lincoln

1259.quote: Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.
1259.author: Brooke Shields

1260.quote: All right everyone, line up alphabetically according to your height.
1260.author: Casey Stengel

1261.quote: I have six locks on my door all in a row. When I go out, I lock every other one. I figure no matter how long somebody stands there picking the locks, they are always locking three.
1261.author: Elayne Boosler

1262.quote: I have yet to hear a man ask for advice on how to combine marriage and a career.
1262.author: Gloria Steinem

1263.quote: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
1263.author: Hedy Lamarr

1264.quote: It is even harder for the average ape to believe that he has descended from man.
1264.author: H. L. Mencken

1265.quote: When we talk to God, we're praying. When God talks to us, we're schizophrenic.
1265.author: Jane Wagner

1266.quote: Do not worry about avoiding temptation. As you grow older it will avoid you.
1266.author: Joey Adams

1267.quote: There are lots of people who mistake their imagination for their memory.
1267.author: Josh Billings

1268.quote: Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you fall into an open sewer and die.
1268.author: Mel Brooks

1269.quote: The fascination of shooting as a sport depends almost wholly on whether you are at the right or wrong end of the gun.
1269.author: P. G. Wodehouse

1270.quote: The way my luck is running, if I was a politician I would be honest.
1270.author: Rodney Dangerfield

1271.quote: The most exciting phrase to hear in science, the one that heralds new discoveries, is not 'Eureka!' but 'That's funny...'
1271.author: Isaac Asimov

1272.quote: The gummy bears tattoo was my idea. It's my son's favorite candy. The sketch was my other son's idea. It's a self-portrait of himself. I just showed the artist his sketch and had him tattoo it on my forearm. It looks like a stick person with big hair. It's pretty funny.
1272.author: Prince Fielder

1273.quote: I see fighters make funny videos about me and stick them on Facebook and get 20 likes. When I make a video, I sell it to Fox and make seven figures. That's the difference.
1273.author: Conor McGregor

1274.quote: And remember, it's also very funny, because side by side with grief lies joy.
1274.author: Fran Drescher

1275.quote: The tax collector must love poor people, he's creating so many of them.
1275.author: Bill Vaughan

1276.quote: I've always wanted to go to Switzerland to see what the army does with those wee red knives.
1276.author: Billy Connolly

1277.quote: I love to go to Washington - if only to be near my money.
1277.author: Bob Hope

1278.quote: Every cloud has its silver lining but it is sometimes a little difficult to get it to the mint.
1278.author: Don Marquis

1279.quote: Don't forget Mother's Day. Or as they call it in Beverly Hills, Dad's Third Wife Day.
1279.author: Jay Leno

1280.quote: Cure for an obsession: get another one.
1280.author: Mason Cooley

1281.quote: If men knew how women pass the time when they are alone, they'd never marry.
1281.author: O. Henry

1282.quote: This suspense is terrible. I hope it will last.
1282.author: Oscar Wilde

1283.quote: Housework can't kill you, but why take a chance?
1283.author: Phyllis Diller

1284.quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
1284.author: Robin Williams

1285.quote: When we ask for advice, we are usually looking for an accomplice.
1285.author: Saul Bellow

1286.quote: A sure cure for seasickness is to sit under a tree.
1286.author: Spike Milligan

1287.quote: Be thankful we're not getting all the government we're paying for.
1287.author: Will Rogers

1288.quote: I wear a necklace, cause I wanna know when I'm upside down.
1288.author: Mitch Hedberg

1289.quote: It is easy for me to love myself, but for ladies to do it is another question altogether.
1289.author: Johnny Vegas

1290.quote: You know, you can touch a stick of dynamite, but if you touch a venomous snake it'll turn around and bite you and kill you so fast it's not even funny.
1290.author: Steve Irwin

1291.quote: Why is Cloud 9 so amazing? What is wrong with Cloud 8? That joke came off the top of my head, and the top of my head ain't funny!
1291.author: Mitch Hedberg

1292.quote: Memories are doing funny things to us.
1292.author: Milos Forman

1293.quote: I wouldn't totally rule out doing Letterman or the Tonight Show if I had a set that I just happened to write that I thought was funny but was still appropriate for network censors. But I'm not going to go out of my way.
1293.author: Joe Rogan

1294.quote: When humor can be made to alternate with melancholy, one has a success, but when the same things are funny and melancholic at the same time, it's just wonderful.
1294.author: Francois Truffaut

1295.quote: I had to act in a school play when I was about ten years old. I really didn't want to do it. But everyone had to do it so I didn't have a choice. A talent agent came and watched it and later gave me some work. It's funny because I'd always known that I wanted a movie career. I just didn't think that I would be in the movies.
1295.author: Kristen Stewart

1296.quote: Some people say funny things, but I say things funny.
1296.author: Don Rickles

1297.quote: I don't believe that anybody has come to a conclusion on why something is funny. It's funny because it's ridiculous and it's ridiculous for different reasons at different times.
1297.author: Jackie Mason

1298.quote: I think a lot of stuff I find funny is from day dreaming.
1298.author: Demetri Martin

1299.quote: I think the word 'pregnant' is funny.
1299.author: Tracy Morgan

1300.quote: That's a funny thing, fame. People definitely do treat you differently. When you begin to be successful, people say, 'Don't go changing.' Well, that's easy to say, but the fact is, you don't change at all - other people do.
1300.author: Jonathan Rhys Meyers

1301.quote: I've actually tried to roast somebody that I don't like, and it doesn't go well. Either they're a bad sport or I'm not as funny as I could be.
1301.author: Jeff Ross

1302.quote: People forget how outcast 'They Might Be Giants' can be. They have a reputation for writing really deft, funny, clever melodies, and they also make a lot of music for kids, which is terrific, but when you see them in concert, they can rock the house.
1302.author: John Hodgman

1303.quote: I realised that if you get yourself labeled as the funny one, people don't look any further. I've used that as I've got older. It's controlling: I decide what part of my personality you're seeing. I don't want you to look at me, I really don't. I don't want you to comment on my clothes, my hair or the way I look.
1303.author: Catherine Tate

1304.quote: I like bowling. I suck at it, but I like it. You know what's so funny? I have days when I'm absolutely great at doing it, and then I have days when I just don't understand it.
1304.author: Lil' Kim

1305.quote: I've experienced plenty of times when something I think is funny doesn't do very well. And there are times when something I don't think is funny makes the audience laugh so hard.
1305.author: Carrot Top

1306.quote: Can someone's true value really be estimated? Maybe there needs to be an Edmunds.com for people on TV. That would be funny and possibly cruel.
1306.author: Derek Hough

1307.quote: In preschool, I would plan out my show-and-tell every week to be funny and exciting. Then in first grade I wrote a play, and my classmates and I performed it as a puppet show.
1307.author: Maxim Knight

1308.quote: I would love to do a movie with Albert Brooks; we're so different, but I find him so funny, and I can be just as seemingly narcissistic as he comes off, the 'it's all about me' kind of thing.
1308.author: Chevy Chase

1309.quote: I refuse to dress 'hot' for Halloween, 'cause I always have to have makeup and hair and look cute for my job. So on Halloween, I either go gory or weird or funny.
1309.author: Rachel Platten

1310.quote: Tact is the ability to describe others as they see themselves.
1310.author: Abraham Lincoln

1311.quote: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?
1311.author: Abraham Lincoln

1312.quote: Conversation would be vastly improved by the constant use of four simple words: I do not know.
1312.author: Andre Maurois

1313.quote: As for our majority... one is enough.
1313.author: Benjamin Disraeli

1314.quote: One man is as good as another until he has written a book.
1314.author: Benjamin Jowett

1315.quote: I would never die for my beliefs because I might be wrong.
1315.author: Bertrand Russell

1316.quote: I'd luv to kiss ya, but I just washed my hair.
1316.author: Bette Davis

1317.quote: After all is said and done, sit down.
1317.author: Bill Copeland

1318.quote: My definition of an intellectual is someone who can listen to the William Tell Overture without thinking of the Lone Ranger.
1318.author: Billy Connolly

1319.quote: I have a wonderful make-up crew. They're the same people restoring the Statue of Liberty.
1319.author: Bob Hope

1320.quote: I love fools' experiments. I am always making them.
1320.author: Charles Darwin

1321.quote: Everybody talks about the weather, but nobody does anything about it.
1321.author: Charles Dudley Warner

1322.quote: I have a new philosophy. I'm only going to dread one day at a time.
1322.author: Charles M. Schulz

1323.quote: What after all, is a halo? It's only one more thing to keep clean.
1323.author: Christopher Fry

1324.quote: If you want a guarantee, buy a toaster.
1324.author: Clint Eastwood

1325.quote: They say marriages are made in Heaven. But so is thunder and lightning.
1325.author: Clint Eastwood

1326.quote: I consider that a man's brain originally is like a little empty attic, and you have to stock it with such furniture as you choose.
1326.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

1327.quote: The four building blocks of the universe are fire, water, gravel and vinyl.
1327.author: Dave Barry

1328.quote: I cannot sing, dance or act; what else would I be but a talk show host.
1328.author: David Letterman

1330.quote: A pessimist is a person who has had to listen to too many optimists.
1330.author: Don Marquis

1331.quote: I'm spending a year dead for tax reasons.
1331.author: Douglas Adams

1332.quote: I've never been married, but I tell people I'm divorced so they won't think something is wrong with me.
1332.author: Elayne Boosler

1333.quote: I think they should have a Barbie with a buzz cut.
1333.author: Ellen DeGeneres

1334.quote: People always ask me, 'Were you funny as a child?' Well, no, I was an accountant.
1334.author: Ellen DeGeneres

1335.quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the hell she is.
1335.author: Ellen DeGeneres

1336.quote: Never have more children than you have car windows.
1336.author: Erma Bombeck

1337.quote: I'm for whatever gets you through the night.
1337.author: Frank Sinatra

1338.quote: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me.
1338.author: Fred Allen

1339.quote: The last time I saw him he was walking down lover's lane holding his own hand.
1339.author: Fred Allen

1340.quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
1340.author: George Bernard Shaw

1341.quote: If you live to be one hundred, you've got it made. Very few people die past that age.
1341.author: George Burns

1342.quote: May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.
1342.author: George Carlin

1343.quote: Frisbeetarianism is the belief that when you die, your soul goes up on the roof and gets stuck.
1343.author: George Carlin

1344.quote: Electricity is really just organized lightning.
1344.author: George Carlin

1345.quote: He was like a cock who thought the sun had risen to hear him crow.
1345.author: George Eliot

1346.quote: Anyone who says he can see through women is missing a lot.
1346.author: Groucho Marx

1347.quote: Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race.
1347.author: H. G. Wells

1348.quote: If I knew for a certainty that a man was coming to my house with the conscious design of doing me good, I should run for my life.
1348.author: Henry David Thoreau

1349.quote: She was a handsome woman of forty-five and would remain so for many years.
1349.author: J. B. Priestley

1350.quote: I don't deserve this award, but I have arthritis and I don't deserve that either.
1350.author: Jack Benny

1351.quote: If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
1351.author: Jack Benny

1352.quote: Christopher Columbus, as everyone knows, is honored by posterity because he was the last to discover America.
1352.author: James Joyce

1353.quote: Only the mediocre are always at their best.
1353.author: Jean Giraudoux

1354.quote: If God wanted us to bend over he'd put diamonds on the floor.
1354.author: Joan Rivers

1355.quote: I hate housework! You make the beds, you do the dishes and six months later you have to start all over again.
1355.author: Joan Rivers

1356.quote: I distrust camels, and anyone else who can go a week without a drink.
1356.author: Joe E. Lewis

1357.quote: If it weren't for Philo T. Farnsworth, inventor of television, we'd still be eating frozen radio dinners.
1357.author: Johnny Carson

1358.quote: I was so naive as a kid I used to sneak behind the barn and do nothing.
1358.author: Johnny Carson

1359.quote: Who included me among the ranks of the human race?
1359.author: Joseph Brodsky

1360.quote: There's a great power in words, if you don't hitch too many of them together.
1360.author: Josh Billings

1361.quote: Life is hard. After all, it kills you.
1361.author: Katharine Hepburn

1362.quote: If a cluttered desk is the sign of a cluttered mind, what is the significance of a clean desk?
1362.author: Laurence J. Peter

1363.quote: Originality is the fine art of remembering what you hear but forgetting where you heard it.
1363.author: Laurence J. Peter

1364.quote: If two wrongs don't make a right, try three.
1364.author: Laurence J. Peter

1365.quote: Communism is like one big phone company.
1365.author: Lenny Bruce

1366.quote: If truth is beauty, how come no one has their hair done in the library?
1366.author: Lily Tomlin

1367.quote: If you want to be thought a liar, always tell the truth.
1367.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

1368.quote: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
1368.author: Luis Bunuel

1369.quote: Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before.
1369.author: Mae West

1370.quote: I used to be Snow White, but I drifted.
1370.author: Mae West

1371.quote: The reports of my death have been greatly exaggerated.
1371.author: Mark Twain

1372.quote: You can lead a man to Congress, but you can't make him think.
1372.author: Milton Berle

1373.quote: Experience is what you have after you've forgotten her name.
1373.author: Milton Berle

1376.quote: Why don't you get a haircut? You look like a chrysanthemum.
1376.author: P. G. Wodehouse

1377.quote: Memories are like mulligatawny soup in a cheap restaurant. It is best not to stir them.
1377.author: P. G. Wodehouse

1378.quote: Because of their size, parents may be difficult to discipline properly.
1378.author: P. J. O'Rourke

1379.quote: Cleanliness becomes more important when godliness is unlikely.
1379.author: P. J. O'Rourke

1380.quote: I'm thankful for the three ounce Ziploc bag, so that I have somewhere to put my savings.
1380.author: Paula Poundstone

1381.quote: The only time I ever enjoyed ironing was the day I accidentally got gin in the steam iron.
1381.author: Phyllis Diller

1382.quote: He looked about as inconspicuous as a tarantula on a slice of angel food.
1382.author: Raymond Chandler

1383.quote: Any kid will run any errand for you, if you ask at bedtime.
1383.author: Red Skelton

1384.quote: By all means let's be open-minded, but not so open-minded that our brains drop out.
1384.author: Richard Dawkins

1385.quote: I was a vegetarian until I started leaning toward the sunlight.
1385.author: Rita Rudner

1386.quote: When I eventually met Mr. Right I had no idea that his first name was Always.
1386.author: Rita Rudner

1387.quote: I have tried to know absolutely nothing about a great many things, and I have succeeded fairly well.
1387.author: Robert Benchley

1388.quote: Older people shouldn't eat health food, they need all the preservatives they can get.
1388.author: Robert Orben

1389.quote: I found there was only one way to look thin: hang out with fat people.
1389.author: Rodney Dangerfield

1390.quote: I looked up my family tree and found out I was the sap.
1390.author: Rodney Dangerfield

1391.quote: Before I refuse to take your questions, I have an opening statement.
1391.author: Ronald Reagan

1392.quote: Parents are the last people on earth who ought to have children.
1392.author: Samuel Butler

1393.quote: I don't think anyone should write their autobiography until after they're dead.
1393.author: Samuel Goldwyn

1394.quote: One of the disadvantages of wine is that it makes a man mistake words for thoughts.
1394.author: Samuel Johnson

1395.quote: How long was I in the army? Five foot eleven.
1395.author: Spike Milligan

1396.quote: If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner.
1396.author: Tallulah Bankhead

1397.quote: The chief function of the body is to carry the brain around.
1397.author: Thomas A. Edison

1398.quote: You can do anything with bayonets except sit on them.
1398.author: Thomas Hardy

1399.quote: Two wrongs don't make a right, but they make a good excuse.
1399.author: Thomas Szasz

1400.quote: There is nothing in the world that I loathe more than group activity, that communal bath where the hairy and slippery mix in a multiplication of mediocrity.
1400.author: Vladimir Nabokov

1401.quote: The superfluous, a very necessary thing.
1401.author: Voltaire

1402.quote: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.
1402.author: W. C. Fields

1404.quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
1404.author: William James

1405.quote: Work hard for what you want because it won't come to you without a fight. You have to be strong and courageous and know that you can do anything you put your mind to. If somebody puts you down or criticizes you, just keep on believing in yourself and turn it into something positive.
1405.author: Leah LaBelle

1406.quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
1406.author: Dalai Lama

1407.quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
1407.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

1408.quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
1408.author: Joseph Campbell

1409.quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
1409.author: Joyce Brothers

1410.quote: I truly believe that everything that we do and everyone that we meet is put in our path for a purpose. There are no accidents; we're all teachers - if we're willing to pay attention to the lessons we learn, trust our positive instincts and not be afraid to take risks or wait for some miracle to come knocking at our door.
1410.author: Marla Gibbs

1411.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
1411.author: Helen Keller

1412.quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
1412.author: Willie Nelson

1413.quote: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
1413.author: Joyce Meyer

1414.quote: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
1414.author: Joel Osteen

1415.quote: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
1415.author: Allen Klein

1416.quote: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
1416.author: Elbert Hubbard

1417.quote: Correction does much, but encouragement does more.
1417.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

1418.quote: God never ends anything on a negative; God always ends on a positive.
1418.author: Edwin Louis Cole

1419.quote: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
1419.author: Henri Nouwen

1420.quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
1420.author: Matt Cameron

1421.quote: I often think that the night is more alive and more richly colored than the day.
1421.author: Vincent Van Gogh

1422.quote: No matter what you're going through, there's a light at the end of the tunnel and it may seem hard to get to it but you can do it and just keep working towards it and you'll find the positive side of things.
1422.author: Demi Lovato

1423.quote: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.
1423.author: Les Brown

1424.quote: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
1424.author: Hans Selye

1426.quote: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
1426.author: Pat Riley

1427.quote: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
1427.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

1428.quote: You've done it before and you can do it now. See the positive possibilities. Redirect the substantial energy of your frustration and turn it into positive, effective, unstoppable determination.
1428.author: Ralph Marston

1429.quote: Successful people maintain a positive focus in life no matter what is going on around them. They stay focused on their past successes rather than their past failures, and on the next action steps they need to take to get them closer to the fulfillment of their goals rather than all the other distractions that life presents to them.
1429.author: Jack Canfield

1430.quote: To succeed, you need to find something to hold on to, something to motivate you, something to inspire you.
1430.author: Tony Dorsett

1431.quote: Positive feelings come from being honest about yourself and accepting your personality, and physical characteristics, warts and all; and, from belonging to a family that accepts you without question.
1431.author: Willard Scott

1432.quote: The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.
1432.author: Christopher McCandless

1433.quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
1433.author: George Allen, Sr.

1434.quote: You have to enjoy life. Always be surrounded by people that you like, people who have a nice conversation. There are so many positive things to think about.
1434.author: Sophia Loren

1435.quote: While you're going through this process of trying to find the satisfaction in your work, pretend you feel satisfied. Tell yourself you had a good day. Walk through the corridors with a smile rather than a scowl. Your positive energy will radiate. If you act like you're having fun, you'll find you are having fun.
1435.author: Jean Chatzky

1436.quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
1436.author: Joel Osteen

1437.quote: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.
1437.author: Les Brown

1438.quote: You are the sum total of everything you've ever seen, heard, eaten, smelled, been told, forgot - it's all there. Everything influences each of us, and because of that I try to make sure that my experiences are positive.
1438.author: Maya Angelou

1439.quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
1439.author: Lee Iacocca

1440.quote: I don't think of myself as a role model for others, but I like to live my life by my own integrity. So, in that sense, I might be a positive influence. I do believe you should get over your insecurities and just try to be the best you can.
1440.author: Lily Cole

1441.quote: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
1441.author: Jenn Proske

1442.quote: We can bring positive energy into our daily lives by smiling more, talking to strangers in line, replacing handshakes with hugs, and calling our friends just to tell them we love them.
1442.author: Brandon Jenner

1443.quote: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.
1443.author: Kobe Bryant

1444.quote: I think it's important to get your surroundings as well as yourself into a positive state - meaning surround yourself with positive people, not the kind who are negative and jealous of everything you do.
1444.author: Heidi Klum

1445.quote: When you show deep empathy toward others, their defensive energy goes down, and positive energy replaces it. That's when you can get more creative in solving problems.
1445.author: Stephen Covey

1446.quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
1446.author: Khalil Gibran

1447.quote: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
1447.author: Wade Boggs

1448.quote: When you wake up every day, you have two choices. You can either be positive or negative; an optimist or a pessimist. I choose to be an optimist. It's all a matter of perspective.
1448.author: Harvey Mackay

1449.quote: I do believe we're all connected. I do believe in positive energy. I do believe in the power of prayer. I do believe in putting good out into the world. And I believe in taking care of each other.
1449.author: Harvey Fierstein

1450.quote: The internet could be a very positive step towards education, organisation and participation in a meaningful society.
1450.author: Noam Chomsky

1451.quote: Social media websites are no longer performing an envisaged function of creating a positive communication link among friends, family and professionals. It is a veritable battleground, where insults fly from the human quiver, damaging lives, destroying self-esteem and a person's sense of self-worth.
1451.author: Anthony Carmona

1452.quote: It takes but one positive thought when given a chance to survive and thrive to overpower an entire army of negative thoughts.
1452.author: Robert H. Schuller

1453.quote: At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.
1453.author: Jane D. Hull

1454.quote: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.
1454.author: Michael Jordan

1455.quote: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
1455.author: Joel Osteen

1456.quote: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power.
1456.author: William James

1457.quote: I'm looking forward to influencing others in a positive way. My message is you can do anything if you just put your mind to it.
1457.author: Justin Bieber

1458.quote: I was determined to share my positive approach and not let diabetes stand in the way of enjoying my life.
1458.author: Paula Deen

1459.quote: Listening is a positive act: you have to put yourself out to do it.
1459.author: David Hockney

1460.quote: Having the positive belief that it will all be O.K. just means that you hustle and make it work because failure is not even an option in your own mind.
1460.author: Natalie Massenet

1461.quote: Our chief want is someone who will inspire us to be what we know we could be.
1461.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

1462.quote: It's a wonderful thing to be optimistic. It keeps you healthy and it keeps you resilient.
1462.author: Daniel Kahneman

1463.quote: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.
1463.author: Colin Powell

1464.quote: Delete the negative; accentuate the positive!
1464.author: Donna Karan

1465.quote: If you're not making mistakes, then you're not doing anything. I'm positive that a doer makes mistakes.
1465.author: John Wooden

1466.quote: It's important to think good, speak good, and do good. If we want to see positive change in the world, then we need to connect to goodness. I try in everything I do, both in business and philanthropy, to make a positive change and do that by doing good.
1466.author: Shari Arison

1467.quote: I always like to look on the optimistic side of life, but I am realistic enough to know that life is a complex matter.
1467.author: Walt Disney

1468.quote: Few things in the world are more powerful than a positive push. A smile. A world of optimism and hope. A 'you can do it' when things are tough.
1468.author: Richard M. DeVos

1469.quote: It's your outlook on life that counts. If you take yourself lightly and don't take yourself too seriously, pretty soon you can find the humor in our everyday lives. And sometimes it can be a lifesaver.
1469.author: Betty White

1470.quote: There is no advertisement as powerful as a positive reputation traveling fast.
1470.author: Brian Koslow

1471.quote: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge.
1471.author: Albert Einstein

1472.quote: Satisfaction consists in freedom from pain, which is the positive element of life.
1472.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

1473.quote: You have to listen to the people who have a negative opinion as well as those who have positive opinion. Just to make sure that you are blending all these opinions in your mind before a decision is made.
1473.author: Carlos Ghosn

1474.quote: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
1474.author: David Bailey

1475.quote: I truly believe in positive synergy, that your positive mindset gives you a more hopeful outlook, and belief that you can do something great means you will do something great.
1475.author: Russell Wilson

1476.quote: Virtually nothing is impossible in this world if you just put your mind to it and maintain a positive attitude.
1476.author: Lou Holtz

1477.quote: The learner always begins by finding fault, but the scholar sees the positive merit in everything.
1477.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

1478.quote: Look up, laugh loud, talk big, keep the color in your cheek and the fire in your eye, adorn your person, maintain your health, your beauty and your animal spirits.
1478.author: William Hazlitt

1479.quote: A year or so ago I went through all the people in my life and asked myself: does this person inspire me, genuinely love me and support me unconditionally? I wanted nothing but positive influences in my life.
1479.author: Mena Suvari

1480.quote: There is only one thing for us to do, and that is to do our level best right where we are every day of our lives; To use our best judgment, and then to trust the rest to that Power which holds the forces of the universe in his hands.
1480.author: Orison Swett Marden

1481.quote: Success or failure depends more upon attitude than upon capacity successful men act as though they have accomplished or are enjoying something. Soon it becomes a reality. Act, look, feel successful, conduct yourself accordingly, and you will be amazed at the positive results.
1481.author: William James

1482.quote: In high school, in sport, I had a coach who told me I was much better than I thought I was, and would make me do more in a positive sense. He was the first person who taught me not to be afraid of failure.
1482.author: Mike Krzyzewski

1483.quote: My ultimate aim is to make euthanasia a positive experience.
1483.author: Jack Kevorkian

1484.quote: Financial institutions, the corporate world and civil society - all must uphold high standards of probity in their working. Only a genuine partnership between the Government and its people can bring about positive change to create a just society.
1484.author: Pratibha Patil

1485.quote: It's all positive energy from me, man.
1485.author: Swizz Beatz

1486.quote: Museums are managers of consciousness. They give us an interpretation of history, of how to view the world and locate ourselves in it. They are, if you want to put it in positive terms, great educational institutions. If you want to put it in negative terms, they are propaganda machines.
1486.author: Hans Haacke

1487.quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
1487.author: Shiv Khera

1488.quote: When the negative thoughts come - and they will; they come to all of us - it's not enough to just not dwell on it... You've got to replace it with a positive thought.
1488.author: Joel Osteen

1489.quote: It is as if my life were magically run by two electric currents: joyous positive and despairing negative - whichever is running at the moment dominates my life, floods it.
1489.author: Sylvia Plath

1490.quote: Your destiny is to fulfill those things upon which you focus most intently. So choose to keep your focus on that which is truly magnificent, beautiful, uplifting and joyful. Your life is always moving toward something.
1490.author: Ralph Marston

1491.quote: Winners make a habit of manufacturing their own positive expectations in advance of the event.
1491.author: Brian Tracy

1492.quote: Don't let people disrespect you. My mom says don't open the door to the devil. Surround yourself with positive people.
1492.author: Cuba Gooding, Jr.

1493.quote: I believe in Karma. If the good is sown, the good is collected. When positive things are made, that returns well.
1493.author: Yannick Noah

1494.quote: There is no racial or ethnic involvement in Thanksgiving, and people who may be very distant from the Christian system can see the beauty and the positive spirit that comes from the holiday.
1494.author: John Clayton

1495.quote: Most of the people I know who work out seriously do so because they have such an amazing outlook on life. To be who I want to be, I'm going to work out to be more positive, more active. It's proactive.
1495.author: John Krasinski

1496.quote: Cognitive therapy is based on the idea that when you change the way you think, you can change the way you feel and behave.
