2850.author: Barack Obama

2851.quote: I'll never stop dreaming that one day we can be a real family, together, all of us laughing and talking, loving and understanding, not looking at the past but only to the future.
2851.author: LaToya Jackson

2852.quote: A real man loves his wife, and places his family as the most important thing in life. Nothing has brought me more peace and content in life than simply being a good husband and father.
2852.author: Frank Abagnale

2853.quote: To this day, just always treat people the way you want to be treated. Whether it's family or friends or co-workers, I think it's the most important thing. Whether you have success or don't have it, whether you're a good person is all that matters.
2853.author: Brenda Song

2854.quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
2854.author: Barbara Bush

2855.quote: Feelings of worth can flourish only in an atmosphere where individual differences are appreciated, mistakes are tolerated, communication is open, and rules are flexible - the kind of atmosphere that is found in a nurturing family.
2855.author: Virginia Satir

2856.quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.
2856.author: Erma Bombeck

2857.quote: I have a dream of re-creating the fantastic family I grew up in with my brother and my parents. I am lucky that I have such a good image of family life - my father and mother are still in love, still happy.
2857.author: Caterina Murino

2858.quote: Great men show politeness in a particular way; a smile suffices to assure you that you are welcome, and keep about their avocations as if you were a member of the family.
2858.author: John James Audubon

2859.quote: Cherish your human connections - your relationships with friends and family.
2859.author: Barbara Bush

2860.quote: He who is overly attached to his family members experiences fear and sorrow, for the root of all grief is attachment. Thus one should discard attachment to be happy.
2860.author: Chanakya

2861.quote: It's one of the worst-kept secrets of family life that all parents have a preferred son or daughter, and the rules for acknowledging it are the same everywhere: The favored kids recognize their status and keep quiet about it - the better to preserve the good thing they've got going and to keep their siblings off their back.
2861.author: Jeffrey Kluger

2862.quote: A man should never neglect his family for business.
2862.author: Walt Disney

2863.quote: A home with a loving and loyal husband and wife is the supreme setting in which children can be reared in love and righteousness and in which the spiritual and physical needs of children can be met.
2863.author: David A. Bednar

2864.quote: Stop doing things that waste time. Don't replace time with your family or things that you need to do. I needed to put together two fantasy teams this weekend because that's something I enjoy, but I did stop playing Nintendo Wii for hours on end.
2864.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

2865.quote: You aren't your work, your accomplishments, your possessions, your home, your family... your anything. You're a creation of your Source, dressed in a physical human body intended to experience and enjoy life on Earth.
2865.author: Wayne Dyer

2866.quote: Growing up in the days when you still had to punch buttons to make a telephone call, I could recall the numbers of all my close friends and family. Today, I'm not sure if I know more than four phone numbers by heart. And that's probably more than most.
2866.author: Joshua Foer

2867.quote: If you're not comfortable with public speaking - and nobody starts out comfortable; you have to learn how to be comfortable - practice. I cannot overstate the importance of practicing. Get some close friends or family members to help evaluate you, or somebody at work that you trust.
2867.author: Hillary Clinton

2868.quote: The great danger for family life, in the midst of any society whose idols are pleasure, comfort and independence, lies in the fact that people close their hearts and become selfish.
2868.author: Pope John Paul II

2869.quote: I have frequently been questioned, especially by women, of how I could reconcile family life with a scientific career. Well, it has not been easy.
2869.author: Marie Curie

2870.quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.
2870.author: Princess Diana

2871.quote: As a child my family's menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it.
2871.author: Buddy Hackett

2872.quote: AIDS can destroy a family if you let it, but luckily for my sister and me, Mom taught us to keep going. Don't give up, be proud of who you are, and never feel sorry for yourself.
2872.author: Ryan White

2873.quote: The warrior may fight for gold or for an immediate gain, or for something to take home for the winter to feed the family. The soldier is part of a more complex society. He's fighting for a group ethic of some sort.
2873.author: C. J. Cherryh

2874.quote: Apparently, one in five people in the world are Chinese. And there are five people in my family, so it must be one of them. It's either my mum or my dad. Or my older brother, Colin. Or my younger brother, Ho-Chan-Chu. But I think it's Colin.
2874.author: Tim Vine

2875.quote: I have the best roommates in the world! It creates a fun sense of family... and that's really important to me. Things can get so lonely without it.
2875.author: Kristen Bell

2876.quote: I've spent a lot of Thanksgivings on the road with my band, so anytime that I can spend Thanksgiving with my family in a traditional aspect, eating sweet potatoes and cranberries and stuffing and all the trappings of Thanksgiving and then get on a treadmill the next day extra long, I'm happy.
2876.author: Richie Sambora

2877.quote: It's true, Christmas can feel like a lot of work, particularly for mothers. But when you look back on all the Christmases in your life, you'll find you've created family traditions and lasting memories. Those memories, good and bad, are really what help to keep a family together over the long haul.
2877.author: Caroline Kennedy

2878.quote: For me, it's about the way I carry myself and the way I treat other people. My relationship and how I feel about God and what He does for me, is something deeply personal. It's where I came from, my family, I was brought up in a religious household and that's very important to me.
2878.author: Beyonce Knowles

2879.quote: I wanted to say thanks... and share my gratitude for everything I've been blessed with. Family, friends, and continued support from everyone.
2879.author: Travis Barker

2880.quote: I absolutely love spending time with my family.
2880.author: Kevin Alejandro

2881.quote: Manhood is taking care of your family and being able to bless other people. Not yourself - but whether you can bless other people.
2881.author: Magic Johnson

2882.quote: I think the expectation of me was that I'd grow up, get married, have a family, probably not even have a job outside the home. I had bold notions sometime in my childhood that I wanted to be veterinarian... I wasn't sure I'd ever do it.
2882.author: Drew Gilpin Faust

2883.quote: I actually didn't grow up in a household that loved Chinese food particularly, and it's not really my go-to food or anything... We were more a pizza family, being from the Chicago area and all.
2883.author: Jami Attenberg

2884.quote: My family and friends were definitely the key to my recovery. One thing that I do suggest is that anyone dealing with a life-threatening illness like cancer choose a point person for people to call to find out how you are doing - a sister, brother, mother, father, daughter, son, or close friend.
2884.author: Olivia Newton-John

2885.quote: People talk about balance. Balance is an awful measure of things because it implies a scale that inevitably tips. I like to look through the filter of, 'Is the life I'm leading consistent with my priorities?' For me, my family is the ultimate litmus test.
2885.author: Ivanka Trump

2886.quote: I woke up one morning thinking about wolves and realized that wolf packs function as families. Everyone has a role, and if you act within the parameters of your role, the whole pack succeeds, and when that falls apart, so does the pack.
2886.author: Jodi Picoult

2887.quote: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
2887.author: Earl Nightingale

2888.quote: A good job is more than just a paycheck. A good job fosters independence and discipline, and contributes to the health of the community. A good job is a means to provide for the health and welfare of your family, to own a home, and save for retirement.
2888.author: James H. Douglas, Jr.

2889.quote: No family gets rich from earning the minimum wage. In fact, the current minimum wage does not even lift a family out of poverty.
2889.author: Jon Corzine

2890.quote: I am extraordinarily lucky, I was born in a family of strong moral values, and in my life I was able to do what I liked best: debuts, great theatres, but above all, inner and deep satisfaction.
2890.author: Jose Carreras

2891.quote: I think that's become passe, but if you can surround yourself with a kind of monument to yourself and your family - a statement - and you can afford it, then that's a noble project.
2891.author: Sylvester Stallone

2892.quote: You cannot have maternal health without reproductive health. And reproductive health includes contraception and family planning and access to legal, safe abortion.
2892.author: Hillary Clinton

2893.quote: The dream was not to put one black family in the White House, the dream was to make everything equal in everybody's house.
2893.author: Al Sharpton

2894.quote: My family, frankly, they weren't folks who went to church every week. My mother was one of the most spiritual people I knew but she didn't raise me in the church, so I came to my Christian faith later in life and it was because the precepts of Jesus Christ spoke to me in terms of the kind of life that I would want to lead.
2894.author: Barack Obama

2895.quote: I hate the way they portray us in the media. If you see a black family it says they're looting, if you see a white family it says they're looking for food.
2895.author: Kanye West

2896.quote: Our responsibility is to rally and lead the whole party and the Chinese people of all ethnic groups, take up this historic baton and continue working hard for the great renewal of the Chinese nation, so that we will stand rock firm in the family of nations and make fresh and greater contribution to mankind.
2896.author: Xi Jinping

2897.quote: The black family survived centuries of slavery and generations of Jim Crow, but it has disintegrated in the wake of the liberals' expansion of the welfare state.
2897.author: Thomas Sowell

2898.quote: My advice: Take a second out of the day today and be thankful for your family.
2898.author: Jenna Morasca

2899.quote: The dilemma for society is how to preserve personal and family values in a nation of diverse tastes.
2899.author: Tipper Gore

2900.quote: The one thing I've always said: Let your family and close friends be the judge of who you are as a person. Don't worry about being judged by others who don't know you, because your family and close friends know what you're all about, good and bad.
2900.author: Rick Pitino

2901.quote: That's what I do this for, to secure my family's future. I don't care about anything else. I'm able to spoil people, and that's the best thing.
2901.author: Conor McGregor

2902.quote: Growing up around Amish farmland, I enjoyed the opportunity to witness firsthand their love of family, of the domestic arts - sewing, quilting, cooking, baking - as well as seeing them live out their tradition of faith in such a unique way.
2902.author: Beverly Lewis

2903.quote: Every working family in America knows how hard it is today to find affordable childcare or early childhood education.
2903.author: Bernie Sanders

2904.quote: Every day I wake up and I lay in bed counting my blessings and saying my prayers for how fortunate I am to have great fans and health and family.
2904.author: Luke Bryan

2905.quote: I started athletics in 1999, throwing discus and shot put. I didn't tell my family when I started boxing.
2905.author: Mary Kom

2906.quote: Little children are still the symbol of the eternal marriage between love and duty.
2906.author: George Eliot

2907.quote: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back.
2907.author: John Ruskin

2908.quote: A woman should be home with the children, building that home and making sure there's a secure family atmosphere.
2908.author: Mel Gibson

2909.quote: I've always put my family first and that's just the way it is.
2909.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

2910.quote: I believe the world is one big family, and we need to help each other.
2910.author: Jet Li

2911.quote: We love to be with our family and friends and I can tell you that lots of eating will be involved.
2911.author: Julia Barr

2912.quote: Like all my family and class, I considered it a sign of weakness to show affection; to have been caught kissing my mother would have been a disgrace, and to have shown affection for my father would have been a disaster.
2912.author: Agnes Smedley

2913.quote: In a big family the first child is kind of like the first pancake. If it's not perfect, that's okay, there are a lot more coming along.
2913.author: Antonin Scalia

2914.quote: Only solitary men know the full joys of friendship. Others have their family; but to a solitary and an exile his friends are everything.
2914.author: Warren G. Harding

2915.quote: I grew up in a family where we weren't allowed to talk about beauty or to put any emphasis on physical appearance.
2915.author: Pam Grier

2916.quote: I came from a family who believed in, in quotes, the Rights of Man: who believed that in order to justify the sort of luxurious life that the majority of us have, related to the whole world, that you had to do something.
2916.author: Richard Attenborough

2917.quote: My encounters with racism are sort of second-hand situations where I might be standing around with a group of white friends and someone makes a comment that they wouldn't make at my family reunion.
2917.author: Wentworth Miller

2918.quote: Skype is easy enough to use so that people don't need to be tech savvy - a lot of users just want to communicate with their friends and family, and they find this is the easiest, cheapest way.
2918.author: Niklas Zennstrom

2919.quote: If I were to retire, I would keep my family's interest in the company the same and say, Don't sell.
2919.author: Sheldon Adelson

2920.quote: My family kinda hit the skids. We were experiencing poverty at that point. We all got a job, where the whole family had to work as security guards and janitors. And I just got angry.
2920.author: Jim Carrey

2921.quote: Men have looked upon the desert as barren land, the free holding of whoever chose; but in fact each hill and valley in it had a man who was its acknowledged owner and would quickly assert the right of his family or clan to it, against aggression.
2921.author: T. E. Lawrence

2922.quote: When I was a kid, the only way I saw movies was from the back seat of my family's car at the drive-in.
2922.author: Forest Whitaker

2923.quote: And I keep saying, whether you like the president or not, everybody has to pull together and help the president because, as the president goes, so goes the country, as the country goes, so goes your job, your ability to feed your family, your government.
2923.author: Michael Bloomberg

2924.quote: Being rich is a good thing. Not just in the obvious sense of benefitting you and your family, but in the broader sense. Profits are not a zero sum game. The more you make, the more of a financial impact you can have.
2924.author: Mark Cuban

2925.quote: After 20 years in the game, I was fortunate to get away from the game and enjoy my family, which was great for me.
2925.author: Joe Sakic

2926.quote: I had a really wonderful upbringing. We were a tight family. It was wonderful to grow up with so many siblings. We were all just a year or two apart, and we were always so supportive of each other. I learned everything from my older brother and sister and taught it to my younger sisters.
2926.author: Joaquin Phoenix

2927.quote: You're scrutinized all through your life - you're scrutinized by your family, by yourself, by society, and your friends in a certain way, shape, or form.
2927.author: Colin Farrell

2928.quote: A lot of parents never speak to their transgender kids again; that's not the case in my family.
2928.author: Chaz Bono

2929.quote: I give God all the glory. And try to move on. Come home and hug my wife and my children. And thank God for every day that I have with my family.
2929.author: Jayson Williams

2930.quote: My wife and I both come from Irish families. There are two kinds of Irish families: the hitting kind and the kidding kind. If you're fortunate - and both of us are - you come from the kidding kind of Irish family.
2930.author: P. J. O'Rourke

2931.quote: Like a lot of you, I grew up in a family on the ragged edges of the middle class. My daddy sold carpeting and ended up as a maintenance man. After he had a heart attack, my mom worked the phones at Sears so we could hang on to our house.
2931.author: Elizabeth Warren

2932.quote: I like playing music because it's a good living and I get satisfaction from it. But I can't feed my family with satisfaction.
2932.author: James Hetfield

2933.quote: I grew up in a working-class family, so I guess you could say I write from what I know.
2933.author: Andrea Arnold

2934.quote: Film is a much lonelier process than theatre. You really don't have any rehearsal time in film. You don't shape it together... with theatre, there is a complete kind of family atmosphere. The sociable side of this business is the theatrical side, it really isn't the film side.
2934.author: Keira Knightley

2935.quote: Because of my own family's service (in the U.S. Army, Navy, and Massachusetts and New York National Guard), I am a strong supporter of the military and do believe that there are just wars.
2935.author: Camille Paglia

2936.quote: I now have two different audiences. There's the one that has been watching my action films for 20 years, and the American family audience. American jokes, less fighting.
2936.author: Jackie Chan

2937.quote: There's a line I have that our family was designed more for public than for private. But there are definitely some things that are only mine. I am someone who dreams at night, and you don't know what I'm dreaming.
2937.author: Carrie Fisher

2938.quote: All the songs I write are about human dynamics, whether it's with girlfriends, boyfriends, or family.
2938.author: Amy Winehouse

2939.quote: Brazil is where I belong, the place that feels like home. They love their family, their country and God, and are not afraid to let anybody know it.
2939.author: Dionne Warwick

2940.quote: I like simple things. I like being in my family in the South and playing petanque.
2940.author: Jean Dujardin

2941.quote: I'm just trying to be the me that I am and not all of this other crap. I just want to be the family man, and if somehow I can make the money to get my ranch and get the hell away from everybody else, that would be awesome.
2941.author: Chris Kyle

2942.quote: Let us nurture the practice of family values, by embracing policies that value families.
2942.author: Benjamin Todd Jealous

2943.quote: I'm so happy with my family, my career and my friends, and I'd like for them to be here forever, so I guess loss is what scares me the most.
2943.author: Jared Padalecki

2944.quote: My experiences in life are getting bigger and better. The more stuff I do, the more stuff I talk about - having kids, traveling, going through relationship problems, dealing with things in my own family. All that stuff builds character.
2944.author: Kevin Hart

2945.quote: I never thought I'd be making a living off of acting - it's still kind of a shock for my family and friends to see my face on TV every Wednesday night.
2945.author: Matthew Gray Gubler

2946.quote: I'm a pretty uncomplicated person. I live a very simple life with my family and I enjoy very ordinary things.
2946.author: Khaled Hosseini

2947.quote: Rock 'n' roll accepted me and paid me, even though I loved the big bands... I went that way because I wanted a home of my own. I had a family. I had to raise them. Let's don't leave out the economics. No way.
2947.author: Chuck Berry

2948.quote: Life hands us a lot of hard choices, and other people can help us more than we might realize. We often think we should make important decisions using just our own internal resources. What are the pros and cons? What does my gut tell me? But often we have friends and family who know us in ways we don't know ourselves.
2948.author: Sheena Iyengar

2949.quote: When you come from a big family, you see that, growing up, you're learning how to share. Your sisters have got your back; you're not alone in this - 'We all support you!' Your family provides that; it gives you a sense of safety, and it's a very grounding feeling.
2949.author: Gisele Bundchen

2950.quote: Some people start modeling because they want to be models and they want the parties and the recognition, and then there are people like me. I come from a simple family, and for me getting into modeling was a chance to make money and create a business.
2950.author: Gisele Bundchen

2951.quote: Our family room, where we live, is about togetherness and ease. Nothing in my house is too formal. There are no coasters on tables; the kids can eat Popsicles on the couch if they want to. I let them ride these little cycles we got for them when they were 3 that have rubber wheels and no pedals.
2951.author: Cindy Crawford

2952.quote: I've got to be able to get my time off whether it's just enjoying my house or the peace and quiet of my family and being there and cooking for them. I love doing that. I also love doing leisure things. I ride horses. I love to shop. I love to drive!
2952.author: LisaRaye McCoy-Misick

2953.quote: If you have a friend or a family member who's bipolar, or has panic attack disorder, or is depressed, read up on it a little bit so you can get to know where they're coming from.
2953.author: Eric Millegan

2954.quote: The way it works in our family is, it's the family business. Much like in the Mafia. Every child is given the opportunity to act at a young age and to learn what it's like to be in the business.
2954.author: Jordan Bridges

2955.quote: Whether one is Marian or Charismatic or both, or prays in one or more of the many other ways open to us, it is all a flow of love, if the heart is truly speaking to and listening to the Holy Trinity. Personally, I pray the Divine Mercy chaplet every day. We pray the Rosary every day in our family.
2955.author: Michael O'Brien

2956.quote: Heavenly Father has assigned us to a great variety of stations to strengthen and, when needed, to lead travelers to safety. Our most important and powerful assignments are in the family. They are important because the family has the opportunity at the start of a child's life to put feet firmly on the path home.
2956.author: Henry B. Eyring

2957.quote: Every family in America knows they have to do a budget. Every small business in America knows they have to do a budget. Every local government, every state, knows they have to do a budget.
2957.author: John Boehner

2958.quote: It is mind-boggling to me that the Almighty power created everything I see; the Bible says that God created the entire universe just so he could create this galaxy just so he could create Earth so he could create human beings so he could create a family.
2958.author: Rick Warren

2959.quote: I love 'Braxton Family Values!' I love seeing a strong family unit striving for success while dealing with everyday struggles like everyone else. Whatever drama they find themselves in, they find a way to solve it and get back to the importance of family. A positive show for sure.
2959.author: Drew Sidora

2960.quote: When it gets to the part in life where you're more afraid of what your wife is going to do to you than if you box, say, Mike Tyson, you've got to get a new profession. You don't get to be a family. I know why boxers never quit, some of them. They don't have wives.
2960.author: George Foreman

2961.quote: Christmas is a huge thing in my family. We usually start decorating the day after Thanksgiving. We spend Christmas Eve with one set of grandparents, and Christmas Day with the other grandparents and our family.
2961.author: Samantha Isler

2962.quote: Skiing takes so much out of me, and when I start a family, I want to do it 100%.
2962.author: Lindsey Vonn

2963.quote: Motor racing is like one big family, ultimately, and when you come back to it, that's really what it feels like.
2963.author: Mario Andretti

2964.quote: My off-the-field heroes, the people who gave me the values to live by and who inspired me with their hard work and unselfish dedication to their family, were my mom, Catherine, and my dad, William.
2964.author: Allan Ray

2965.quote: I love the community of theater. There is something about the camaraderie: People who show up eight times a week to do a show. It's unlike any other business. It's just lovely. You feel like you're in a family.
2965.author: Billy Porter

2966.quote: My mom's side of the family is from Arkansas!
2966.author: Kelli O'Hara

2967.quote: The single most important factor in our long-term happiness is the relationships we have with our family and close friends.
2967.author: Clayton Christensen

2968.quote: I come from the countryside. I come from a bunch of horticulture family members. My best friend was a farmer's boy.
2968.author: Luke Evans

2969.quote: Regarding marriage, it - somehow, it didn't happen. One fellow in such a big family not getting married is not an issue.
2969.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

2970.quote: Perfect happiness would be knowing that all my family and friends were happy and safe. Then I'd go to a tropical island with my husband where it was gorgeous and fun all day long and interesting and fun all evening. Good food and dancing would be nice, too, and weekly visits from those safe and happy family and friends. Plus world peace.
2970.author: Suzanne Weyn

2971.quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
2971.author: Andre Maurois

2972.quote: A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
2972.author: Charles R. Swindoll

2973.quote: Both within the family and without, our sisters hold up our mirrors: our images of who we are and of who we can dare to be.
2973.author: Elizabeth Fishel

2974.quote: Family quarrels are bitter things. They don't go according to any rules. They're not like aches or wounds, they're more like splits in the skin that won't heal because there's not enough material.
2974.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

2975.quote: The other night I ate at a real nice family restaurant. Every table had an argument going.
2975.author: George Carlin

2976.quote: I love children and I get along with them great. It's just that I believe if you're going to be a parent, there has to be something inside you that says, 'I want a family.' I don't feel that sense of urgency.
2976.author: George Clooney

2977.quote: Happy or unhappy, families are all mysterious. We have only to imagine how differently we would be described - and will be, after our deaths - by each of the family members who believe they know us.
2977.author: Gloria Steinem

2978.quote: The children have been a wonderful gift to me, and I'm thankful to have once again seen our world through their eyes. They restore my faith in the family's future.
2978.author: Jackie Kennedy

2979.quote: When I remember my family, I always remember their backs. They were always indignantly leaving places.
2979.author: John Cheever

2980.quote: Your children are not your children. They are the sons and daughters of Life's longing for itself. They came through you but not from you and though they are with you yet they belong not to you.
2980.author: Khalil Gibran

2981.quote: When you have a godly husband, a godly wife, children who respect their parents and who are loved by their parents, who provide for those children their physical and spiritual and material needs, lovingly, you have the ideal unit.
2981.author: Jerry Falwell

2982.quote: The greatest thing in family life is to take a hint when a hint is intended-and not to take a hint when a hint isn't intended.
2982.author: Robert Frost

2983.quote: Dignity is not negotiable. Dignity is the honor of the family.
2983.author: Vartan Gregorian

2984.quote: The family is the nucleus of civilization.
2984.author: Will Durant

2985.quote: Maybe there is no actual place called hell. Maybe hell is just having to listen to our grandparents breathe through their noses when they're eating sandwiches.
2985.author: Jim Carrey

2986.quote: The foundation of family - that's where it all begins for me.
2986.author: Faith Hill

2987.quote: Women's natural role is to be a pillar of the family.
2987.author: Grace Kelly

2988.quote: I am the baby in the family, and I always will be. I am actually very happy to have that position. But I still get teased. I don't mind that.
2988.author: Janet Jackson

2989.quote: When I was younger, my family would go camping and fishing on our ranches. My dad loves being around all kinds of animals. He's the one who got me to be a really big animal lover.
2989.author: Paris Hilton

2990.quote: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.
2990.author: Ralph Fiennes

2991.quote: Tennis just a game, family is forever.
2991.author: Serena Williams

2992.quote: The one thing that kept our family together was the music. The only thing that our family would share emotionally was to have our dad cry over something the kids did with music.
2992.author: Dennis Wilson

2993.quote: I have a lot of very close girlfriends and sisters - I'm from an all female family. My father often quips that even the cat was neutered!
2993.author: Shirley Manson

2994.quote: Pray in your family daily, that yours may be in the number of the families who call upon God.
2994.author: Christopher Love

2995.quote: If one is desperate for love, I suggest looking at one's friends and family and see if love is all around. If not, get a new set of friends, a new family.
2995.author: Jasmine Guy

2996.quote: You have to defend your honor. And your family.
2996.author: Suzanne Vega

2997.quote: I come from that society and there is a common thread, specifically family values - the idea that you do anything for your family, and the unconditional love for one's children.
2997.author: Ednita Nazario

2998.quote: We went to church every Sunday. When I was a kid, the only time I sang was around my family.
2998.author: Darius Rucker

2999.quote: I have a great family, I live an amazing life.
2999.author: John Oates

3000.quote: I have a family to support. And I'm not always going to be doing exactly what I want to do.
3000.author: Patrick Warburton

3001.quote: Our family life was certainly not intellectual.
3001.author: Douglass North

3002.quote: When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.
3002.author: Guy Lafleur

3003.quote: A family can develop only with a loving woman as its center.
3003.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

3004.quote: People are pretty forgiving when it comes to other people's families. The only family that ever horrifies you is your own.
3004.author: Douglas Coupland

3005.quote: Only solitary men know the full joys of frienship. Others have their family; but to a solitary and an exile, his friends are everything.
3005.author: Willa Cather

3006.quote: Nixon was the most dishonest individual I have ever met in my life. He lied to his wife, his family, his friends, his colleagues in the Congress, lifetime members of his own political party, the American people and the world.
3006.author: Barry Goldwater

3007.quote: I have a very good family. I'm very fortunate to have a very good family. I believe very strongly in the family. It's one of the things we have in our platform, is to talk about it.
3007.author: Dan Quayle

3008.quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
3008.author: George Bernard Shaw

3009.quote: A plague on eminence! I hardly dare cross the street anymore without a convoy, and I am stared at wherever I go like an idiot member of a royal family or an animal in a zoo; and zoo animals have been known to die from stares.
3009.author: Igor Stravinsky

3010.quote: To each other, we were as normal and nice as the smell of bread. We were just a family. In a family even exaggerations make perfect sense.
3010.author: John Irving

3011.quote: To maintain a joyful family requires much from both the parents and the children. Each member of the family has to become, in a special way, the servant of the others.
3011.author: Pope John Paul II

3012.quote: Cherish your human connections: your relationships with friends and family.
3012.author: Joseph Brodsky

3013.quote: Writing is a solitary occupation. Family, friends, and society are the natural enemies of the writer. He must be alone, uninterrupted, and slightly savage if he is to sustain and complete an undertaking.
3013.author: Jessamyn West

3014.quote: The practice of patience toward one another, the overlooking of one another's defects, and the bearing of one another's burdens is the most elementary condition of all human and social activity in the family, in the professions, and in society.
3014.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

3015.quote: We believed in our idea - a family park where parents and children could have fun- together.
3015.author: Walt Disney

3016.quote: In dwelling, live close to the ground. In thinking, keep to the simple. In conflict, be fair and generous. In governing, don't try to control. In work, do what you enjoy. In family life, be completely present.
3016.author: Lao Tzu

3017.quote: There can be hope only for a society which acts as one big family, not as many separate ones.
3017.author: Anwar Sadat

3018.quote: The family, that dear octopus from whose tentacles we never quite escape, nor in our innermost hearts never quite wish to.
3018.author: Dodie Smith

3019.quote: All happy families resemble one another, each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
3019.author: Leo Tolstoy

3020.quote: No matter what you've done for yourself or for humanity, if you can't look back on having given love and attention to your own family, what have you really accomplished?
3020.author: Lee Iacocca

3021.quote: Once you agree upon the price you and your family must pay for success, it enables you to ignore the minor hurts, the opponent's pressure, and the temporary failures.
3021.author: Vince Lombardi

3022.quote: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty. All other pacts of love or fear derive from it and are modeled upon it.
3022.author: Haniel Long

3023.quote: I looked up my family tree and found out I was the sap.
3023.author: Rodney Dangerfield

3024.quote: I'm not a kid. You don't get in this business for anonymity. It's not like I have posters of myself on the wall, but at the same time, I'm kind of ready for a little bit of it, but I worry for my little one, and my family - their privacy. That's what I'm more protective of.
3024.author: Hugh Jackman

3025.quote: The revolution is carried out by means of one's thought, not through one's family background.
3025.author: Kim Jong Il

3026.quote: My other family is Fleetwood Mac. I don't need the money, but there's an emotional need for me to go on the road again. There's a love there; we're a band of brothers.
3026.author: Stevie Nicks

3027.quote: My wife, my family, my friends - they've all taught me things about love and what that emotion really means. In a nutshell, loving someone is about giving, not receiving.
3027.author: Nicholas Sparks

3028.quote: Some twins feel like they need to compare themselves to each other, but we're not that way. That's because of my parents, though, and having six kids in the family.
3028.author: Ashley Olsen

3029.quote: Even the simplest wicker basket can become priceless when it is loved and cared for through the generations of a family.
3029.author: Sister Parish

3030.quote: As they say in Italy, Italians were eating with a knife and fork when the French were still eating each other. The Medici family had to bring their Tuscan cooks up there so they could make something edible.
3030.author: Mario Batali

3031.quote: Soon we saw that money going to women brought much more benefit to the family than money going to the men. So we changed our policy and gave a high priority to women. As a result, now 96% of our four million borrowers in Grameen Bank are women.
3031.author: Muhammad Yunus

3032.quote: There is other disturbing facts surround the hideous 911 attacks, which my family and I could see from the third floor bathroom window of our homes!
3032.author: Amiri Baraka

3033.quote: Family trips to Yellowstone and to what are now national parks in Southern Utah, driving the primitive roads and cars of that day, were real adventures.
3033.author: Paul D. Boyer

3034.quote: My own mother always taught me that fairness was a family value - I think equal pay is about fairness for everyone.
3034.author: Mike Honda

3035.quote: Restless, and in desperate need of adventure, I quit my job at an insurance company to travel west with a couple of guys I smoked pot with, scandalizing my family.
3035.author: Mink Stole

3036.quote: I can't say it's not painful being estranged from most of my family. I wish it could be otherwise.
3036.author: LaToya Jackson

3037.quote: Like Canada, we very much wanted the United Nations to be a relevant and effective body. But once those efforts failed, we no longer saw things from a multilateral perspective. For us, now, it is much more basic than that. It is about family.
3037.author: Paul Cellucci

3038.quote: I come from a really big family, my father was a businessman and what he always instilled in us was to be your own boss. My father built up his business, and he was by no means a rich man, but he figured out how to work four-and-a-half days a week.
3038.author: Tony Shalhoub

3039.quote: When I was in China, Mao was Chairman, and parents were terrified to tell their children anything that differed from the party line in case the children repeated it and endangered the whole family.
3039.author: Jung Chang

3040.quote: The Sabbath is a weekly cathedral raised up in my dining room, in my family, in my heart.
3040.author: Anita Diament

3041.quote: Life is about family and technology.
3041.author: Mark Goddard

3042.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
3042.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

3043.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
3043.author: Helen Keller

3044.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
3044.author: St. Jerome

3045.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
3045.author: Og Mandino

3046.quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
3046.author: Joyce Brothers

3047.quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
3047.author: Buddha

3048.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
3048.author: Audrey Hepburn

3049.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
3049.author: Benjamin Franklin

3050.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
3050.author: Vince Lombardi

3051.quote: Ultimately, leadership is not about glorious crowning acts. It's about keeping your team focused on a goal and motivated to do their best to achieve it, especially when the stakes are high and the consequences really matter. It is about laying the groundwork for others' success, and then standing back and letting them shine.
3051.author: Chris Hadfield

3052.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
3052.author: Henry Ford

3053.quote: I am as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
3053.author: Walt Whitman

3054.quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
3054.author: Richard Bach

3055.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
3055.author: Mahatma Gandhi

3056.quote: I'm selfish, impatient, and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I'm out of control, and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
3056.author: Marilyn Monroe

3057.quote: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.
3057.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

3058.quote: At the end of the day, life is about being happy being who you are, and I feel like we are so blessed to have the support system and the best family to really just support each other no matter what we're going through.
3058.author: Kim Kardashian

3059.quote: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth.
3059.author: Abraham Lincoln

3060.quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
3060.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

3061.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
3061.author: Peter Drucker

3062.quote: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
3062.author: Pat Riley

3063.quote: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
3063.author: Ernest Hemingway

3064.quote: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
3064.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

3065.quote: The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter.
3065.author: Winston Churchill

3066.quote: No one wants to die. Even people who want to go to heaven don't want to die to get there. And yet death is the destination we all share. No one has ever escaped it. And that is as it should be, because Death is very likely the single best invention of Life. It is Life's change agent. It clears out the old to make way for the new.
3066.author: Steve Jobs

3067.quote: To help yourself, you must be yourself. Be the best that you can be. When you make a mistake, learn from it, pick yourself up and move on.
3067.author: Dave Pelzer

3068.quote: My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.'
3068.author: Magdalena Neuner

3069.quote: Technology can be our best friend, and technology can also be the biggest party pooper of our lives. It interrupts our own story, interrupts our ability to have a thought or a daydream, to imagine something wonderful, because we're too busy bridging the walk from the cafeteria back to the office on the cell phone.
3069.author: Steven Spielberg

3070.quote: One of the best ways to make yourself happy in the present is to recall happy times from the past. Photos are a great memory-prompt, and because we tend to take photos of happy occasions, they weight our memories to the good.
3070.author: Gretchen Rubin

3071.quote: I'm just thankful for everything, all the blessings in my life, trying to stay that way. I think that's the best way to start your day and finish your day. It keeps everything in perspective.
3071.author: Tim Tebow

3072.quote: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.
3072.author: Nick Cannon

3073.quote: The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?
3073.author: Edgar Allan Poe

3074.quote: My mama always used to tell me: 'If you can't find somethin' to live for, you best find somethin' to die for.'
3074.author: Tupac Shakur

3075.quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
3075.author: Aristotle

3076.quote: She's always there for me when I need her; She's my best friend; she's just my everything.
3076.author: Ashley Olsen

3077.quote: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.
3077.author: Audrey Hepburn

3078.quote: I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best.
3078.author: Benjamin Disraeli

3079.quote: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
3079.author: Bill Watterson

3080.quote: Do right. Do your best. Treat others as you want to be treated.
3080.author: Lou Holtz

3081.quote: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
3081.author: Pope John XXIII

3082.quote: I look my best when I'm totally free, on holiday, walking on the beach.
3082.author: Rosamund Pike

3083.quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
3083.author: Christopher Morley

3084.quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.
3084.author: Marcus Aurelius

3085.quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
3085.author: George Allen, Sr.

3086.quote: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
3086.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

3087.quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
3087.author: Mark Twain

3088.quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
3088.author: Theodore Roosevelt

3089.quote: All the adversity I've had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me... You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
3089.author: Walt Disney

3090.quote: I never had a policy; I have just tried to do my very best each and every day.
3090.author: Abraham Lincoln

3091.quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
3091.author: Epictetus

3092.quote: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
3092.author: Laurence J. Peter

3093.quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
3093.author: Lao Tzu

3094.quote: 'Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.
3094.author: Alice Walker

3095.quote: It's a funny thing about life; if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
3095.author: W. Somerset Maugham

3096.quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
3096.author: Chanakya

3097.quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
3097.author: Theodore Roosevelt

3098.quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
3098.author: Dalai Lama

3099.quote: One's philosophy is not best expressed in words; it is expressed in the choices one makes... and the choices we make are ultimately our responsibility.
3099.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

3100.quote: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
3100.author: Oscar Wilde

3101.quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
3101.author: Lee Iacocca

3102.quote: I don't think of myself as a role model for others, but I like to live my life by my own integrity. So, in that sense, I might be a positive influence. I do believe you should get over your insecurities and just try to be the best you can.
3102.author: Lily Cole

3103.quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
3103.author: Justin Timberlake

3104.quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
3104.author: Al Lopez

3106.quote: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
3106.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

3107.quote: The best thing commercially, which is the worst artistically, by and large, is the most successful.
3107.author: Orson Welles

3108.quote: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
3108.author: Carl Jung

3109.quote: The best remedy for those who are afraid, lonely or unhappy is to go outside, somewhere where they can be quiet, alone with the heavens, nature and God. Because only then does one feel that all is as it should be.
3109.author: Anne Frank

3110.quote: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
3110.author: Andy Serkis

3111.quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
3111.author: Duke Ellington

3112.quote: I think it's very important to have a feedback loop, where you're constantly thinking about what you've done and how you could be doing it better. I think that's the single best piece of advice: constantly think about how you could be doing things better and questioning yourself.
3112.author: Elon Musk

3113.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
3113.author: Frank Sinatra

3114.quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.
3114.author: Joyce Giraud

3115.quote: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
3115.author: Winston Churchill

3116.quote: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
3116.author: Francis Bacon

3117.quote: I'm human, I'm not perfect. I make mistakes all the time, but I guess my job is to keep those mistakes to myself, which I'm already fine doing and just try to be the best I can be for those kids.
3117.author: Selena Gomez

3118.quote: Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.
3118.author: John Wooden

3119.quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
3119.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

3120.quote: You don't fight racism with racism, the best way to fight racism is with solidarity.
3120.author: Bobby Seale

3121.quote: Baseball was, is and always will be to me the best game in the world.
3121.author: Babe Ruth

3122.quote: Success is peace of mind which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you did your best to become the best you are capable of becoming.
3122.author: John Wooden

3123.quote: Living well is the best revenge.
3123.author: George Herbert

3124.quote: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
3124.author: Thomas Jefferson

3125.quote: Good teachers know how to bring out the best in students.
3125.author: Charles Kuralt

3126.quote: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.
3126.author: Jim Elliot

3127.quote: The best kids are going to become the best. But the best thing about it is that you're going to learn lessons in playing those sports about winning and losing and teamwork and teammates and arguments and everything else that are going to affect you positively for the rest of your life.
3127.author: Carl Lewis

3128.quote: I prefer to win titles with the team ahead of individual awards or scoring more goals than anyone else. I'm more worried about being a good person than being the best football player in the world. When all this is over, what are you left with? When I retire, I hope I am remembered for being a decent guy.
3128.author: Lionel Messi

3129.quote: Our prayers should be for blessings in general, for God knows best what is good for us.
3129.author: Socrates

3130.quote: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.
3130.author: Steve Jobs

3131.quote: I look my best when I take my helmet off after a long motorcycle ride. I have a glow and a bit of helmet hair.
3131.author: Eric Bana

3132.quote: We are at our very best, and we are happiest, when we are fully engaged in work we enjoy on the journey toward the goal we've established for ourselves. It gives meaning to our time off and comfort to our sleep. It makes everything else in life so wonderful, so worthwhile.
3132.author: Earl Nightingale

3133.quote: Battle is the most magnificent competition in which a human being can indulge. It brings out all that is best; it removes all that is base. All men are afraid in battle. The coward is the one who lets his fear overcome his sense of duty. Duty is the essence of manhood.
3133.author: George S. Patton

3134.quote: Heroes represent the best of ourselves, respecting that we are human beings. A hero can be anyone from Gandhi to your classroom teacher, anyone who can show courage when faced with a problem. A hero is someone who is willing to help others in his or her best capacity.
3134.author: Ricky Martin

3135.quote: When you have balance in your life, work becomes an entirely different experience. There is a passion that moves you to a whole new level of fulfillment and gratitude, and that's when you can do your best... for yourself and for others.
3135.author: Cara Delevingne

3136.quote: You have to accept whatever comes and the only important thing is that you meet it with courage and with the best that you have to give.
3136.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

3137.quote: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.
3137.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

3138.quote: The ultimate victory in competition is derived from the inner satisfaction of knowing that you have done your best and that you have gotten the most out of what you had to give.
3138.author: Howard Cosell

3139.quote: The sacrifices made by veterans and their willingness to fight in defense of our nation merit our deep respect and praise - and to the best in benefits and medical care.
3139.author: Sue Kelly

3140.quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else - means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting.
3140.author: e. e. cummings

3141.quote: The only way to get the best of an argument is to avoid it.
3141.author: Dale Carnegie

3142.quote: My cell phone is my best friend. It's my lifeline to the outside world.
3142.author: Carrie Underwood

3143.quote: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
3143.author: Rashida Jones

3144.quote: My best friend is the most important girl, outside of family, to me. I met her when I went to college and we bonded immediately. I'd do anything for her at any time. We phone each other every day.
3144.author: Dawn French

3145.quote: There's nothing better than having a baby. I've always loved children. I used to work summers at the YMCA and be in charge of, like, 30 preschool kids. I knew that when I had a child, I'd be overwhelmed, and it's true... I can't tell you how much my attitude has changed since we've got Frances. Holding my baby is the best drug in the world.
3145.author: Kurt Cobain

3146.quote: To have faith doesn't mean you get any less frustrated when you don't do your best, but you know that it's not life and death. Take what you're given, and when you continue to work hard, you will see results. That will give you the confidence you need to keep going.
3146.author: Tom Lehman

3147.quote: Do the best you can, and don't take life too serious.
3147.author: Will Rogers

3148.quote: Old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
3148.author: Athenaeus

3149.quote: A failure is not always a mistake, it may simply be the best one can do under the circumstances. The real mistake is to stop trying.
3149.author: B. F. Skinner

3150.quote: With modeling, you pose. You want to look your best all the time. With acting, you have to be aware of the camera, but the more you show your imperfections, the better you're going to be.
3150.author: Diane Kruger

3151.quote: I follow three rules: Do the right thing, do the best you can, and always show people you care.
3151.author: Lou Holtz

3152.quote: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
3152.author: Aristotle

3153.quote: Learn to say 'no' to the good so you can say 'yes' to the best.
3153.author: John C. Maxwell

3154.quote: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'
3154.author: Lao Tzu

3155.quote: Let go of yesterday. Let today be a new beginning and be the best that you can, and you'll get to where God wants you to be.
3155.author: Joel Osteen

3156.quote: And while the law of competition may be sometimes hard for the individual, it is best for the race, because it ensures the survival of the fittest in every department.
3156.author: Andrew Carnegie

3157.quote: I lead no party; I follow no leader. I have given the best part of my life to careful study of Islam, its law and polity, its culture, its history and its literature.
3157.author: Muhammad Iqbal

3158.quote: Our flag honors those who have fought to protect it, and is a reminder of the sacrifice of our nation's founders and heroes. As the ultimate icon of America's storied history, the Stars and Stripes represents the very best of this nation.
3158.author: Joe Barton

3159.quote: A person who has been punished is not less inclined to behave in a given way; at best, he learns how to avoid punishment.
3159.author: B. F. Skinner

3160.quote: Personally, I just think rap music is the best thing out there, period. If you look at my deck in my car radio, you're always going to find a hip-hop tape; that's all I buy, that's all I live, that's all I listen to, that's all I love.
3160.author: Eminem

3161.quote: Part of what made the Macintosh great was that the people working on it were musicians, poets, and artists, and zoologists, and historians. They also happened to be the best computer scientists in the world. But if it hadn't been computer science, these people would have been doing amazing things in other fields.
3161.author: Steve Jobs

3162.quote: You must accept that you might fail; then, if you do your best and still don't win, at least you can be satisfied that you've tried. If you don't accept failure as a possibility, you don't set high goals, you don't branch out, you don't try - you don't take the risk.
3162.author: Rosalynn Carter

3163.quote: The best road to progress is freedom's road.
3163.author: John F. Kennedy

3164.quote: A wise man is superior to any insults which can be put upon him, and the best reply to unseemly behavior is patience and moderation.
3164.author: Moliere

3165.quote: I've known my best friend since I was a baby, and I don't know what I would do without her. She is always straight with me and can make me laugh hysterically. Everyone should have someone like that in their life.
3165.author: Jasmine Guinness

3166.quote: The best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as possible.
3166.author: David Ogilvy

3167.quote: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.
3167.author: Francis Bacon

3168.quote: If you want to do really important things in life and big things in life, you can't do anything by yourself. And your best teams are your friends and your siblings.
3168.author: Deepak Chopra

3169.quote: Climate change is destroying our path to sustainability. Ours is a world of looming challenges and increasingly limited resources. Sustainable development offers the best chance to adjust our course.
3169.author: Ban Ki-moon

3170.quote: That best portion of a man's life, his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love.
3170.author: William Wordsworth

3171.quote: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.
3171.author: Ayn Rand

3172.quote: The best weapon against an enemy is another enemy.
3172.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

3173.quote: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm.
3173.author: Willa Cather

3174.quote: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
3174.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

3175.quote: A good character is the best tombstone. Those who loved you and were helped by you will remember you when forget-me-nots have withered. Carve your name on hearts, not on marble.
3175.author: Charles Spurgeon

3176.quote: The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own. You do not blame them on your mother, the ecology, or the president. You realize that you control your own destiny.
3176.author: Albert Ellis

3177.quote: If you die you're completely happy and your soul somewhere lives on. I'm not afraid of dying. Total peace after death, becoming someone else is the best hope I've got.
3177.author: Kurt Cobain

3178.quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
3178.author: Conor Oberst

3179.quote: Remember, always give your best. Never get discouraged. Never be petty. Always remember, others may hate you. But those who hate you don't win unless you hate them. And then you destroy yourself.
3179.author: Richard M. Nixon

3180.quote: Take those chances and you can achieve greatness, whereas if you go conservative, you'll never know. I truly believe what doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Even if you fail, learning and moving on is sometimes the best thing.
3180.author: Danica Patrick

3181.quote: I always believe that to be the best, you have to smell like the best, dress like the best, act like the best. When you throw your trash in the garbage can, it has to be better than anybody else who ever threw trash in the garbage can.
3181.author: Lil Wayne

3182.quote: Arrogance, ignorance, and incompetence. Not a pretty cocktail of personality traits in the best of situations. No sirree. Not a pretty cocktail in an office-mate and not a pretty cocktail in a head of state. In fact, in a leader, it's a lethal cocktail.
3182.author: Graydon Carter

3183.quote: If you do what you love, it is the best way to relax.
3183.author: Christian Louboutin

3184.quote: Mental prayer in my opinion is nothing else than an intimate sharing between friends; it means taking time frequently to be alone with Him who we know loves us. The important thing is not to think much but to love much and so do that which best stirs you to love. Love is not great delight but desire to please God in everything.
3184.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

3185.quote: Chilling out on the bed in your hotel room watching television, while wearing your own pajamas, is sometimes the best part of a vacation.
3185.author: Laura Marano

3186.quote: The things we know best are the things we haven't been taught.
3186.author: Luc de Clapiers

3187.quote: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
3187.author: James Cash Penney

3188.quote: Lay this unto your breast: Old friends, like old swords, still are trusted best.
3188.author: John Webster

3189.quote: Ethical decisions ensure that everyone's best interests are protected. When in doubt, don't.
3189.author: Harvey Mackay

3190.quote: My best vacation is somewhere I could hide, somewhere warm and not a lot of people around.
3190.author: Derek Jeter

3191.quote: Government, even in its best state, is but a necessary evil; in its worst state, an intolerable one.
3191.author: Thomas Paine

3192.quote: The best way to destroy the capitalist system is to debauch the currency.
3192.author: Vladimir Lenin

3193.quote: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.
3193.author: Aristotle

3194.quote: One thing is sure. We have to do something. We have to do the best we know how at the moment... If it doesn't turn out right, we can modify it as we go along.
3194.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

3195.quote: To refrain from imitation is the best revenge.
3195.author: Marcus Aurelius

3196.quote: With the Union my best and dearest earthly hopes are entwined.
3196.author: Franklin Pierce

3197.quote: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.
3197.author: Groucho Marx

3198.quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
3198.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

3199.quote: Dad needs to show an incredible amount of respect and humor and friendship toward his mate so the kids understand their parents are sexy, they're fun, they do things together, they're best friends. Kids learn by example. If I respect Mom, they're going to respect Mom.
3199.author: Tim Allen

3200.quote: Autumn wins you best by this its mute appeal to sympathy for its decay.
3200.author: Robert Browning

3201.quote: Experience taught me a few things. One is to listen to your gut, no matter how good something sounds on paper. The second is that you're generally better off sticking with what you know. And the third is that sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
3201.author: Donald Trump

3202.quote: A satisfied customer is the best business strategy of all.
3202.author: Michael LeBoeuf

3203.quote: Globalization has changed us into a company that searches the world, not just to sell or to source, but to find intellectual capital - the world's best talents and greatest ideas.
3203.author: Jack Welch

3204.quote: What is the recipe for successful achievement? To my mind there are just four essential ingredients: Choose a career you love, give it the best there is in you, seize your opportunities, and be a member of the team.
3204.author: Benjamin Franklin Fairless

3205.quote: Looking good is the best revenge.
3205.author: Ivana Trump

3206.quote: All the best performers bring to their role something more, something different than what the author put on paper. That's what makes theatre live. That's why it persists.
3206.author: Stephen Sondheim

3207.quote: Expect the best, Prepare for the worst.
3207.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

3208.quote: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.
3208.author: Charles Darwin

3209.quote: If it's your job to eat a frog, it's best to do it first thing in the morning. And If it's your job to eat two frogs, it's best to eat the biggest one first.
3209.author: Mark Twain

3210.quote: Employees are a company's greatest asset - they're your competitive advantage. You want to attract and retain the best; provide them with encouragement, stimulus, and make them feel that they are an integral part of the company's mission.
3210.author: Anne M. Mulcahy

3211.quote: I think that's the single best piece of advice: constantly think about how you could be doing things better and questioning yourself.
3211.author: Elon Musk

3212.quote: In 1985, I was living with my sister in Virginia, and since I was still in high school, I worked at McDonald's to save money to get an abortion. It sounds really terrible, but it was the best decision I ever made. It was the first time I took responsibility for my actions. I messed up, had sex without contraception, and got pregnant at 15.
3212.author: Kathleen Hanna

3213.quote: If you work hard and you do your best, you can do anything.
3213.author: Erin Heatherton

3214.quote: Difficult times often bring out the best in people.
3214.author: Bernie Sanders

3215.quote: If you believe that your best years are behind you, you've guaranteed they are; I'm going to dance into that good night, with the oldies turned up loud.
3215.author: Gina Barreca

3216.quote: When things are bad, it's the best time to reinvent yourself.
3216.author: George Lopez

3217.quote: The best time to plan a book is while you're doing the dishes.
3217.author: Agatha Christie

3219.quote: Modeling is the best because you have to look hot, which comes easy to me, you know. I'm blessed with that.
3219.author: Ashton Kutcher

3220.quote: As a footballer, you always want to test yourself against the best.
3220.author: David Beckham

3221.quote: At the end of the day, my goal was to be the best hacker.
3221.author: Kevin Mitnick

3222.quote: Hard work opens doors and shows the world that you are serious about being one of those rare - and special - human beings who use the fullness of their talents to do their very best.
3222.author: Robin S. Sharma

3223.quote: I do the very best I know how - the very best I can; and I mean to keep on doing so until the end.
3223.author: Abraham Lincoln

3224.quote: Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.
3224.author: Art Buchwald

3225.quote: The best work is not what is most difficult for you; it is what you do best.
3225.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

3226.quote: Just do the best you can. No one can do more than that.
3226.author: John Wooden

3227.quote: The best mirror is an old friend.
3227.author: Peter Nivio Zarlenga

3228.quote: The best is the enemy of the good.
3228.author: Voltaire

3229.quote: The best revenge is to live on and prove yourself.
3229.author: Eddie Vedder

3230.quote: Success has a simple formula: do your best, and people may like it.
3230.author: Sam Ewing

3231.quote: The best thinking has been done in solitude. The worst has been done in turmoil.
3231.author: Thomas A. Edison

3232.quote: The portrait I do best is of the person I know best.
3232.author: Nadar

3233.quote: I believe God is managing affairs and that He doesn't need any advice from me. With God in charge, I believe everything will work out for the best in the end. So what is there to worry about.
3233.author: Henry Ford

3234.quote: Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
3234.author: Donald Trump

3235.quote: I did not wish to take a cabin passage, but rather to go before the mast and on the deck of the world, for there I could best see the moonlight amid the mountains. I do not wish to go below now.
3235.author: Henry David Thoreau

3236.quote: There is only one thing for us to do, and that is to do our level best right where we are every day of our lives; To use our best judgment, and then to trust the rest to that Power which holds the forces of the universe in his hands.
3236.author: Orison Swett Marden

3237.quote: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of the year.
3237.author: Franklin Pierce Adams

3238.quote: Courtesy is a silver lining around the dark clouds of civilization; it is the best part of refinement and in many ways, an art of heroic beauty in the vast gallery of man's cruelty and baseness.
3238.author: Bryant H. McGill

3239.quote: One of the things that makes our military the best in the world is the certain knowledge of each soldier, sailor, airman, and Marine that they can always count on their comrades should they need help - that they will never be abandoned.
3239.author: Jon Kyl

3240.quote: Patience is the best remedy for every trouble.
3240.author: Plautus

3241.quote: People drain me, even the closest of friends, and I find loneliness to be the best state in the union to live in.
3241.author: Margaret Cho

3242.quote: I think the best thing I can do is to be a distraction. A husband lives and breathes his work all day long. If he comes home to more table thumping, how can the poor man ever relax?
3242.author: Jackie Kennedy

3243.quote: And I believe that the best buy in public health today must be a combination of regular physical exercise and a healthy diet.
3243.author: Julie Bishop

3244.quote: Laughter is the best medicine - unless you're diabetic, then insulin comes pretty high on the list.
3244.author: Jasper Carrott

3245.quote: The United States is the world's best hope, but if you fetter her in the interests and quarrels of other nations, if you tangle her in the intrigues of Europe, you will destroy her power for good and endanger her very existence.
3245.author: Henry Cabot Lodge

3246.quote: Sometimes people just want you to fail. Except your really good friends. I've always known who my best friends were.
3246.author: Kato Kaelin

3248.quote: Use what talents you possess; the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best.
3248.author: Henry Van Dyke

3249.quote: Real education should consist of drawing the goodness and the best out of our own students. What better books can there be than the book of humanity?
3249.author: Cesar Chavez

3250.quote: About astrology and palmistry: they are good because they make people vivid and full of possibilities. They are communism at its best. Everybody has a birthday and almost everybody has a palm.
3250.author: Kurt Vonnegut

3251.quote: I have the best roommates in the world! It creates a fun sense of family... and that's really important to me. Things can get so lonely without it.
3251.author: Kristen Bell

3252.quote: Where I am today... I still have my ups and downs, but I take it one day at a time and I just hope that I can be the best that I can possibly be, not only for myself, but also young people that are out there today that need someone to look up to.
3252.author: Demi Lovato

3253.quote: I just think it is important that you realize, that you're the best in the world. Whether you are a Democrat or Republican or whether you're libertarian or whatever, you are the best. And we should not ever forget that. And when somebody does not do the job, we got to let them go.
3253.author: Clint Eastwood

3254.quote: The best advice I ever got was that knowledge is power and to keep reading.
3254.author: David Bailey

3255.quote: I grew up with just my mom. She and I were like best friends. She's a very independent woman and I admire that about her. In my life, I've tried to be like that. To be okay with being on my own and being independent.
3255.author: Emma Roberts

3256.quote: The biggest ingredient in a best friend is someone whose actions you respect and who you can truly be yourself around.
3256.author: Renee Olstead

3257.quote: I'm not afraid of working hard at anything, whatever it is. I just always want to be the best that I can.
3257.author: Gisele Bundchen

3258.quote: For a lot of people, Superman is and has always been America's hero. He stands for what we believe is the best within us: limitless strength tempered by compassion, that can bear adversity and emerge stronger on the other side. He stands for what we all feel we would like to be able to stand for, when standing is hardest.
3258.author: J. Michael Straczynski

3259.quote: Surround yourself with good people. People who are going to be honest with you and look out for your best interests.
3259.author: Derek Jeter

3260.quote: Nobody's life is a bed of roses. We all have crosses to bear, and we all just do our best. I would never claim to have the worst situation. There are many widows, and many people dying of AIDS, many people killed in Lebanon, people starving all over the planet. So we have to count our lucky stars.
3260.author: Yoko Ono

3261.quote: If you are fearful, a horse will back off. If you are calm and confident, it will come forward. For those who are often flattered or feared, the horse can be a welcome mirror of the best in human nature.
3261.author: Clare Balding

3262.quote: The longer I live, the more I feel that the individual is not so much to blame - not even the worst individuals, not even the 'best' citizens - as the system of corruption which has grown up about us, and which rewards an honest man with a mere living and a crook with all the magnificence of our magnificent modern life.
3262.author: Lincoln Steffens

3263.quote: It's lovely being a parent and being in a strong marriage with somebody who is your best friend.
3263.author: Johnny Vegas

3264.quote: I think people should have fun. And don't get so down on yourself. Enjoy life and be the best person you can be.
3264.author: Keke Palmer

3265.quote: However spontaneous I hope a photograph will look, I always put a lot of thought into how I can make it happen. The very best pictures are the most relaxed, so a lot of fussing around technically can completely break the spell, and everyone freezes up with nerves.
3265.author: Mario Testino

3266.quote: Being in love is the best feeling on the planet. I really believe that love makes the world go round.
3266.author: Sonam Kapoor

3267.quote: The biggest thing for me is the passion that I've always had for hockey. I remember growing up, no matter what I did in life, my parents always told me to try to do my best at it and be my best. I can say going through different things that that passion is the most important part. It's not skills or talent or any of that stuff.
3267.author: Sidney Crosby

3268.quote: The best way to look stylish on a budget is to try second-hand, bargain hunting, and vintage.
3268.author: Orlando Bloom

3269.quote: You know what the best thing about morning ski trips are? McDonald's!
3269.author: Nick Woodman

3270.quote: Do not waste time dreaming of great faraway opportunities; do the best you can where you are. Open your petals of power and beauty and fling out the fragrance of your life in the place that has been assigned to you.
3270.author: Orison Swett Marden

3271.quote: The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone.
3271.author: Karen Salmansohn
