3697.quote: For success of any mission, it is necessary to have creative leadership. Creative leadership is vital for government, non-governmental organisations as well as for industries.
3697.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

3698.quote: The key to being a good manager is keeping the people who hate me away from those who are still undecided.
3698.author: Casey Stengel

3699.quote: The great leaders have always stage-managed their effects.
3699.author: Charles de Gaulle

3700.quote: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.
3700.author: David Joseph Schwartz

3701.quote: The employer generally gets the employees he deserves.
3701.author: J. Paul Getty

3702.quote: Time is neutral and does not change things. With courage and initiative, leaders change things.
3702.author: Jesse Jackson

3703.quote: Be the chief but never the lord.
3703.author: Lao Tzu

3704.quote: A throne is only a bench covered with velvet.
3704.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

3705.quote: Making good decisions is a crucial skill at every level.
3705.author: Peter Drucker

3706.quote: I look for what needs to be done. After all, that's how the universe designs itself.
3706.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

3707.quote: He who is prudent and lies in wait for an enemy who is not, will be victorious.
3707.author: Sun Tzu

3708.quote: If you want a quality, act as if you already had it.
3708.author: William James

3709.quote: No matter how carefully you plan your goals they will never be more than pipe dreams unless you pursue them with gusto.
3709.author: W. Clement Stone

3710.quote: People who enjoy meetings should not be in charge of anything.
3710.author: Thomas Sowell

3711.quote: There are three secrets to managing. The first secret is have patience. The second is be patient. And the third most important secret is patience.
3711.author: Chuck Tanner

3712.quote: The very exercise of leadership fosters capacity for it.
3712.author: Cyril Falls

3713.quote: Management is efficiency in climbing the ladder of success; leadership determines whether the ladder is leaning against the right wall.
3713.author: Stephen Covey

3714.quote: I speak directly to the people, and I know that the people of California want to have better leadership. They want to have great leadership. They want to have somebody that will represent them. And it doesn't matter if you're a Democrat or a Republican, young or old.
3714.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

3715.quote: To have long term success as a coach or in any position of leadership, you have to be obsessed in some way.
3715.author: Pat Riley

3716.quote: The task of leadership is not to put greatness into humanity, but to elicit it, for the greatness is already there.
3716.author: John Buchan

3717.quote: Leadership is, among other things, the ability to inflict pain and get away with it - short-term pain for long-term gain.
3717.author: George Will

3718.quote: Leadership consists not in degrees of technique but in traits of character; it requires moral rather than athletic or intellectual effort, and it imposes on both leader and follower alike the burdens of self-restraint.
3718.author: Lewis H. Lapham

3719.quote: President Bush has shown great leadership. He has said that the 21st century will not be ruled or dictated by terrorists, dictators, and murderers. He is absolutely right. God bless him for his resolve.
3719.author: Lindsey Graham

3720.quote: Leadership is the other side of the coin of loneliness, and he who is a leader must always act alone. And acting alone, accept everything alone.
3720.author: Ferdinand Marcos

3721.quote: You have to enable and empower people to make decisions independent of you. As I've learned, each person on a team is an extension of your leadership; if they feel empowered by you they will magnify your power to lead.
3721.author: Tom Ridge

3722.quote: But the person who scored well on an SAT will not necessarily be the best doctor or the best lawyer or the best businessman. These tests do not measure character, leadership, creativity, perseverance.
3722.author: William Julius Wilson

3723.quote: This assumption of Negro leadership in the ghetto, then, must not be confined to matters of religion, education, and social uplift; it must deal with such fundamental forces in life as make these things possible.
3723.author: Carter G. Woodson

3724.quote: Leadership requires the courage to make decisions that will benefit the next generation.
3724.author: Alan Autry

3725.quote: We should see the leadership from the White House setting dates certain for certain goals of achieving greater alliance on alternative and renewable energy sources, but we are not.
3725.author: Ron Kind

3726.quote: Sport fosters many things that are good; teamwork and leadership.
3726.author: Daley Thompson

3727.quote: The Leadership Training Institute of America trains and equips young men and women to be leaders with high standards of personal morality and integrity.
3727.author: Michael Burgess

3728.quote: At that time, the army leadership said the implementation of this agreement would allow everyone, including the IRA, to take its political objectives forward by peaceful and democratic means.
3728.author: Gerry Adams

3729.quote: You can never stop and as older people, we have to learn how to take leadership from the youth and I guess I would say that this is what I'm attempting to do right now.
3729.author: Angela Davis

3730.quote: Leadership is getting players to believe in you. If you tell a teammate you're ready to play as tough as you're able to, you'd better go out there and do it. Players will see right through a phony. And they can tell when you're not giving it all you've got.
3730.author: Larry Bird

3731.quote: You learn far more from negative leadership than from positive leadership. Because you learn how not to do it. And, therefore, you learn how to do it.
3731.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

3732.quote: Humility is a great quality of leadership which derives respect and not just fear or hatred.
3732.author: Yousef Munayyer

3733.quote: Life isn't easy, and leadership is harder still.
3733.author: Walter Russell Mead

3734.quote: We have treated our most serious adversaries, such as Iran and North Korea, in the most juvenile manner - by giving them the silent treatment. In so doing, we have weakened, not strengthened, our bargaining position and our leadership.
3734.author: Theodore C. Sorensen

3735.quote: The fact that we are here today to debate raising America's debt limit is a sign of leadership failure. America has a debt problem and a failure of leadership. Americans deserve better. I, therefore, intend to oppose the effort to increase America's debt.
3735.author: Barack Obama

3736.quote: Leadership is about being a servant first.
3736.author: Allen West

3737.quote: The secret to understanding me is, I'm not trying to be anybody other than who I actually am. People want candid, refreshing leadership. And I've always tried to go with solutions. You know, I've always tried to say, here's how we get our economy growing, here's why we get our debt under control. That's what Mitt Romney is offering.
3737.author: Paul Ryan

3738.quote: In giving us children, God places us in a position of both leadership and service. He calls us to give up our lives for someone else's sake - to abandon our own desires and put our child's interests first. Yet, according to His perfect design, it is through this selflessness that we can become truly fulfilled.
3738.author: Charles Stanley

3739.quote: God will never direct us to be prideful, arrogant and unforgiving, immoral or slothful or full of fear. We step into these things because we are insensitive to the leadership of the Holy Spirit within us.
3739.author: Charles Stanley

3740.quote: I want American Dream growth - lots of new businesses, well-paying jobs, and American leadership in new industries, like clean energy and biotechnology.
3740.author: William J. Clinton

3741.quote: Leadership can't be fabricated. If it is fabricated and rehearsed, you can't fool the guys in the locker room. So when you talk about leadership, it comes with performance. Leadership comes with consistency.
3741.author: Junior Seau

3742.quote: Washington's answer to a self-inflicted financial crisis reminded Americans why they so deeply distrust the political class. The 'fiscal cliff' process was secretive and sloppy, and the nation's so-called leadership lacked the political courage to address our root problems: joblessness and debt.
3742.author: Ron Fournier

3743.quote: Leadership must be likeable, affable, cordial, and above all emotional. The fashion of authoritarian leadership is gone. Football is about life. You can't be angry all day.
3743.author: Vicente del Bosque
